Na wayɛ; ɛsrane nso ɛhyerɛn anadwofa.
Monhyira no sɛ ɛtɛ nsuo Na ɛma aduan fifi.
Na ɛma asase pa Yi ne nnɛbae nso ma yɛn.
Wama twaberɛ aba Wahyɛ yɛn asɛn mama.
Wama aduan a ɛsen sɛɛ Daa anigyeɛ ho bɛhyɛ.
Anuonyam nka hene, dɛɛfoɛ Abɛdeɛ nto anuonyam Anuonyam nka Agya, ɛba Ne Honhom, Baasakro no.

twi.title: MONYI NYAME HENE AYƐ
verses: Monyi Nyame hene ayɛ Monfa ayɛyie nnwom mma no Nyesoɛ N’ahummɛbɛ tim hɛ daa Esi pi, yɛ nokware daa.
Monhyira no; wayɛ owia Sɛ ɛmmɛ aporɛ daa nyinaa.
Na wayɛ; ɛsrane nso ɛhyerɛn anadwofa.
Monhyira no sɛ ɛtɛ nsuo Na ɛma aduan fifi.
Na ɛma asase pa Yi ne nnɛbae nso ma yɛn.
Wama twaberɛ aba Wahyɛ yɛn asɛn mama.
Wama aduan a ɛsen sɛɛ Daa anigyeɛ ho bɛhyɛ.
Anuonyam nka hene, dɛɛfoɛ Abɛdeɛ nto anuonyam Anuonyam nka Agya, ɛba Ne Honhom, Baasakro no.

english.title: KOKO BI SI NOHO ARA
verses: Koko bi si nohoa ara Kuro kεseε n’akyi hɛ Nea wɛsɛn yɛn wura no Owui gyee yɛn nkwa no.
Yɛnim nso yɛrentumi nka Yea kɛseɛ a ɔhui Nanso yɛgyedi sɛ yɛn nti Na wɛsɛn no wɛ ho.
Obiara nni hɛ a ɔyɛ a Obɛtumi bɔne ayi ɛno nko na ɛbetumi abue Ɔsoro pon ama yɛn.
O W’adɛyɛn dɛ kɛse pa ɛsɛ sɛ yɛ dɛ no Na yɛatwere ne mogya no Na yɛayɛ n’adwuma.

twi.title: KOKO BI SI NOHO ARA
verses: Koko bi si nohoa ara Kuro kεseε n’akyi hɛ Nea wɛsɛn yɛn wura no Owui gyee yɛn nkwa no.
Yɛnim nso yɛrentumi nka Yea kɛseɛ a ɔhui Nanso yɛgyedi sɛ yɛn nti Na wɛsɛn no wɛ ho.
Obiara nni hɛ a ɔyɛ a Obɛtumi bɔne ayi ɛno nko na ɛbetumi abue Ɔsoro pon ama yɛn.
O W’adɛyɛn dɛ kɛse pa ɛsɛ sɛ yɛ dɛ no Na yɛatwere ne mogya no Na yɛayɛ n’adwuma.

twi.title: ƐBƐNE HU NYANSA NTƐM
verses: Ɛbɛne hu nyansa ntɛm Ntwɛn da foforɛ ansa Sɛ woda so po nyansa a Ɛyɛ den sɛ wobɛnya.
Su frɛ ahummɔbɔ ntɛm Ntwɛn da foforɛ ansa Anyɛ a woberɛ atwam Ansa na owia atɛ.
Ɛbɛne san w’akyi ntɛm Ntwɛn da foforɛ ansa Bɛyɛ na wo kanea adum Na nkwahosan aba.
Ɛbɛne yɛ ntɛm gye nhyira Ntwɛn da foforɛ ansa Ansa na mmusuo ato wo Ansa na de akye.

english.title: I NEED THEE EVERY HOUR
verses: I need thee every hour, most gracious Lord No tender voice like thine Can peace afford
I need thee every hour, stay thou near by Temptations lose their pow’r When thou art nigh.
I need thee every hour, in joy or pain, Come quickly and abide, Or life is vain.
I need thee every hour, most Holy one, O make me thine indeed, Thou blessed Son
english.chorus: I need thee, o I need thee, Every hour I need thee O bless me now my Savior, I come to thee.

twi.title: MEHIA WO MMERƐ NYINAA
verses: Mehia w’mmerε nyinaa Awurade Domfoɔ Nne bi mma asomdwoe Sɛ wo de no.
Mehia wo mmerε nyinaa Twe bɛn me daa Wo bɛn me a wɛhwɛ Nni ahoɔden.
Mehia wo mmerε nyinaa Dɛ ne yea mu Bɛtena me nkyɛn, na mma ɛbra nyɛ kwa.
Mehia wo mmerε nyinaa Kyerɛ me wo pɛ Nneɛma a wonhyɛ ho bɛ Yɛ wɛ me mu.
twi.chorus: Nehia wo, ao mehia wo Mmerε nyinaa mehia wo Hyira me seesei m’Agyenkwa Maba wo hɔ.

english.title: BRINGING IN THE SHEAVES
verses: Sowing in the morning, sowing seeds of kindness, Sowing in the noontide and the dewy eve Waiting for the harvest, and the time of reaping
Sowing in the sunshine, sowing in the shadows, Fearing neither clouds nor winter’s chilling breeze By and by the harvest and the labor ended
Going forth with weeping, sowing for the Master To the loss sustained our spirit is often grieves. When our weeping’s over, he will bid us welcome.
english.chorus: We shall come rejoicing, bringing in the sheaves Bringing in the sheaves, We shall come rejoicing, bringing in the sheaves.

twi.title: YƐGU ABA ANƐPA AYAMYE ARA
verses: Yegu aba anɔpa, ayamye aba Yegu aba awiaberem ne annwummerɛ Retwɛn twabere no, ɛne bera a yɛde twa Yɛde anigyeɛ bɛba, yɛde aban bɛba.
Yegu aba awiam, yegu aba nwin mu Yesuro bɔsuo ana osutɔ bere ɛnkyɛ buberɛ no ne adwuma no bɛsa Yɛde anigyeɛ bɛba, yɛde afin’bɛba.
Afei fa suu kodua aba no ma Awurade Yɛhwere nneɛma pii deɛ na yɛn werɛ ho Nanso yɛn nnisuo bɔsa na ɛbɛyɛ yɛn atuu Yɛde anigyeɛ bɛba, yɛde afin’bɛba.
twi.chorus: Yɛde afin’bɛba, yɛde afin’bɛba Yɛde anigyeɛ bɛba, yɛde afin’bɛba.

twi.title: YESU KORA ME ASENNUA HO
verses: Yesu kora me asennua ho Deɛ nsuo a ɛsom bo Fi Kalvary bepɔ so Sen kwa ma obiara.
W’asennua ho, dɛ ne dom Huu me kra hiani Adekyee nsroma hyɛnhyɛn Ne nsɛrɛmɛn hyerɛn me so.
Deɛ esii W’asennua ho Nyame Adwamaa kyerɛ me Ao, boa me na mennante Ne nwunu ase daa.
Mɛwɛn, matwɛn, asennua ho Kɔsi sɛ mɛtumi adu Sikaman asuogya hɔ Wɔ asuo n’akyi hɔ.
twi.chorus: W’asennuam, w’asennuam Na me nhoahoa me ho Kosi sɛ owuo akyi Me kra bɛhome daa.

english.title: NEAR THE CROSS
verses: Jesus keep me near the cross, There a precious fountain Free to all a healing stream, Flows from Calvary’s mountain.
Near the cross, a trembling soul Love and mercy found me There the Bright and Morning Star Sheds its beams around me.
Near the cross, o Lamb of God, Bring its scenes before me Help me walk from day to day, With its shadows o’er me.
Near the cross I’ll watch and wait, Hoping, trusting, ever, Till I reach the golden strand, First beyond the river.
english.chorus: In the cross, in the cross, be my glory ever Till my raptured soul shall find rest beyond the river.

english.title: GYE WƆN A WƆAYERA WƆN A WƆREWU
verses: Gye wɔn a wɔayera wɔn a wɔrewu Hwim wɔn firi bɔne ne damoa mu Su ma deɛ wafom kwan, ma asehwefoɔ so Ka Yesu, Gyefoɔ ho asɛm kyerɛ wɔn.
Wɔdin ne ho fɛw deɛ ɛda so retwɛn Ɔtwɛn ɔba hohwini a wabɛ ko Se wɔn aniberɛ so, se wɔn agobreaseɛm Sɛ wɔgyedi na wɔtie a ɛde bɛkyɛ.
Onipa koma mu papa bi a wɔ hɔ Nyame dom tumi ma efi yiye Ɛte sɛ sanku a ne dwom atwa sin Ɔde nsa ka noa ɛwoso bio.
Gye wɔn a wɔayera, ɛyɛ wadwuma Awurade bɛma wo ho ahoɔden Fa boasetɔ twe wɔn si kwan teaa no so Se adobɔfoɔ sɛ Gyefoɔ awu.
english.chorus: Gye wɔn a wɔayera, wɔn a wɔreyera. Yesu yɛ Agyenkwa Mmɔbɔhunfoɔ

english.title: JUST AS I AM
verses: Just as I am, without one plea, But that thy blood was shed for me, And that thou bidd’st me come to thee, O Lamb of God, I come, I come.
Just as I am, and waiting not To rid my soul of one dark blot To thee whose blood can cleanse each spot, O Lamb of God, I come, I come.
Just as I am, tho tossed about With many a conflict, many a doubt Fightings and fears within, without, O Lamb of God, I come, I come.
Just as I am, poor, wretched, blind, Sight, riches, healing of the mind Yea, all I need in thee to find, O Lamb of God, I come, I come.
Just as I am, thou wilt receive, Wilt welcome, pardon, cleanse, relieve, Because thy promise I believe, O Lamb of God, I come, I come.

twi.title: DEƐ METE YI MENNI HWEE KA
verses: Deɛ mete yi menni hwee ka Sɛ wohwiee wo mogya maa me Na wo ka sɛ memra wo hɔ Nyame adwamma m’aba.
Deɛ mete yi merentwɛn sɛ Mepere ma me kra ho fi Wo a wo mogya tumi tu fi Nyame Adwamma m’aba.
Deɛ mete yi, sɛ aperepere Ɔko ne suro ahyɛ me ma Na akyinnyi him me po a Nyame Adwamma m’aba.
Deɛ mete yi me yɛ mmɔbɔ Anite, ahonya ne ayaresa Deɛ mehwehwɛ nyinaa fi wo hɔ Nyame Adwamma m’aba.
Deɛ mete yi wobɛgye me De akyɛ me ate me ho Megye W’anosɛm medi nti Nyame Adwamma m’aba.

english.title: ABIDE WITH ME
verses: Abide with me, fast falls the eventide, The darkness deepens, Lord, with me abide, When other helpers fail, and comforts flee, Help of the helpless, O abide with me.
Swift to its close ebbs out life’s little day; Earth’s joys grow dim, its glories pass away; Change and decay in all around I see; O thou who changest not, abide with me.
I need thy presence every passing hour, What but thy grace can foil the tempter’s power? Who, like thyself, my guide and stay can be? Thru clouds and sunshine, O abide with me.

twi.title: WO NE ME NTENA
verses: Wo ne me ntena, ade reyɛ asa Sum reduru, Awurade tena menkyɛn Aboafoɔ pa, ne awerɛkyekyefoɔ sa a, O Ankonam Boafoɔ, wo ne me ntena.
Yɛn nkwa nna ketewa yi retwam kɔ Wiase dɛ repa, n’anuonyam resen Ɛsɛe ne nsakyera nko na me hu ha Ao, Wo a Wonsakyera da, wo ne me ntena.
Mehia wo wɔ me nkyɛn berɛ nyinaa W’adom na ɛka sɔhwɛfoɔ no hyɛ Gyefoɔ, kyigyinafoɔ bɛn ɛne wo sɛ? Sum mu o, hann mu o, wo ne me ntena.
Sɛ me ne wo am a mensuro hwee Ɛyɛa nyɛ duru, nnisuo nyɛ nnwono Wuo bɛre, damoa nkonim ɛwɔ hi? Medi nkonim daa sɛ wo ne me ntena.
Memua m’ani a yi w’asennua kyerɛ me Hyerɛn sum mu, kyerɛ me soro kwan Ɛsoro hyerɛn, wiase kusuu resa Owuo mu o, nkwa mu o, wo ne me ntena.

english.title: JESUS, LOVER OF MY SOUL
verses: Jesus, lover of my soul, let me to thy bosom fly While the nearer waters roll, While the tempest still is high Hide me, O my Saviour, hide, Till the storm of life is past.
Other refuge have I none, Hangs my helpless soul on thee; Leave, ah leave me not alone, Still support and comfort me All my trust on thee is stayed, All my help from thee I bring.
Thou, O Christ, art all I want; More than all in thee I find; Raise the fallen, cheer the faint, Heal the sick and lead the blind. Just and holy is thy name, I am all unrighteousness.
Plenteous grace with thee is found, Grace to cover all my sin Let the healing streams abound, Make and keep me pure within. Thou of life the fountain art Freely let me take of thee.

twi.title: YESU ME KRA NE DƐFO
verses: Yesu me kra ne dɛfo Ma menguan mɛhyɛ wo bom Nsuo no reworo yi Me Gyefo fa me hunta Ma ahum no mɛ mmɛsen Gya me kodu berano Ao, awiei no gye me kra.
Menni huntabea biara Me kra twere wo nkutoo Mma nnya me nko ara da Sɛ me mu, kyekye me werɛ Me mmoa nyinaa fi wo hɔ Me werɛ nyinaa hyɛ wo mu Fa wo ntaban kɛseɛ no Kata me tikwa yi so.
Adom pii wɔ so nsam a ɛkata me bɔne so Ma nkwa nsuo no nsen mmra ɛnhohoro na ɛnte me ho Wo ne nkwa asutire no Ma memmɛsa bi mennom Bra bɛtaa me koma mu Taa mu kɔ mmeresanten nyinaa.

english.title: THE GREAT PHYSICIAN
verses: The great Physician now is near, The sympathizing Jesus He speaks the drooping heart to cheer, O hear the voice of Jesus.
Your many sins are all forgiven, O hear the voice of Jesus; Go on your way in peace to heaven, And wear a crown with Jesus.
All glory to the dying Lamb I now believe in Jesus; I love the blessed Savior’s name, I love the name of Jesus.
english.chorus: Sweetest note in seraph song, Sweetest name on mortal tongue.

twi.title: ODUYƐFOɔ KƐSEƐ ABƐN
verses: Oduyɛfoɔ kɛseɛ abɛn ɔne timmɔbɔ Yesu ɔkasa ma koma tɔ yam Dɔfo, tie Yesu nne no.
Wɔde wo bɔne akyɛ wo Dɔfo, tie Yesu nne no Fa asomdwee tu wo kwan kɔ soro Wo ne Yesu nhyɛ ahenkyɛ.
Anuonyam nka Nyame Adwamma Megye Yesu din no di, Me dɔ Gyefoɔ hyirafoɔ no din Me dɔ me Yesu din no.
Ne din yi m’afodie nyinaa Din bi nni hɔ sɛ Yesu Yesu din a ne bo yɛ den Me kra de anigye tie.
Anuanom momma yɛnyi no ayɛ Monyi Yesu din ayɛ Nuammaa mo nso momma mo nne so Monhyira me Yesu din no.
twi.chorus: Dwom a ɛyɛ dɛ wɔ soro Din a ɛyɛ dɛ wɔ asase Ɛyɛ dɛ kyɛn dwom biara Yesu, hyirafoɔ Yesu.

english.title: TAKE THE NAME OF JESUS WITH YOU
verses: Take the name of Jesus with you, Child of sorrow and of woe; It will joy and comfort give you; Take it then where'er you go.
Take the name of Jesus ever, As a shield from ev'ry snare; If temptations round you gather, Breathe that holy name in prayer.
Oh! the precious name of Jesus, How it thrills our souls with joy, When his loving arms receive us, And his songs our tongues employ.
At the name of Jesus bowing, Falling prostrate at his feet, King of kings in Heav'n we'll crown him, When our journey is complete.
english.chorus: Precious name, oh how sweet! Hope of Earth and joy of Heav'n. Precious name, oh how sweet! Hope of Earth and joy of Heav'n.

twi.title: FA YESU DIN BATA WO HO
verses: Fa Yesu din bata wo ho Mmɛbɛrɛni werɛ honi ɛbɛma wo awerɛkyekye Nea wo kɔ biara fa kɔ.
Fa din no yɛ wok wan Wo mfiri nyinaa ho Sɛ sɔhwɛ twa wo ho hyia Bɔ mpae din kronkron no mu.
O Yesu din a ɛsom bo ɛma yɛn kra anigye Bere a ɛyɛ yɛn ɛtuu Na yɛn nne to ne nnwom no.
Yesu din mu na monkoto Na montwa nhwe ne nana sɛ. Hempɛn kɛseɛ s’ro na ɛbɛyɛ Wo yɛn akwantuo awiei.
twi.chorus: O din pa a ɛyɛ dɛ ‘Ha nidaso ne s’ro dɛ O din pa a ɛyɛ dɛ ‘Ha nidaso ne s’ro dɛ.

english.title: CHRIST RECEIVETH SINFUL MEN
verses: Sinners Jesus will receive; Sound this word of grace to all Who the heavenly pathway leave, All who linger, all who fall.
Come, and He will give you rest Trust Him, for His word is plain He will take the sinfulest; Christ receiveth sinful men.
Now my life condemns me not, Pure before the law I stand; He who cleansed me from all spot, Satisfied its last demand.
Christ receiveth sinful men, Even me with all my sins; Purged from every spot and stain, Heaven with Him I enter in.
english.chorus: Sing it o’er and o’er again; Christ receiveth sinful men Make the message clear and plain Christ receiveth sinful men.

twi.title: YESU GYE NNEBƆNEYƐFOƆ
verses: Yesu gye nnebɔneyɛfoɔ Ka adomsɛm yi kyerɛ Wɔn a wɔafi soro kwan no Ne wɔn a wɔahwe ase.
Bra, ɛbɛma wo home Twere no, n’asɛm si pi Kristo gye nnebɔneyɛfoɔ Abɔne mu abɔne.
M’akoma mmbu me fɛ bio Me ho san wɔ mmra n’anim Nea ɔhohoroo me ho fi no Apata mmra no koraa.
Kristo gye nnebɔneyɛfoɔ Me mpo a me bɔne dɔɔso Me nkekae nyinaa bɛtu Ɔne me bɛhyɛn soro.
twi.chorus: Si so to, si so to bio Kristo gye nnebɔneyɛfoɔ Asɛm no, ma wɔnte ase Kristo gye nnebɔneyɛfoɔ.

english.title: I AM THINE, O LORD
verses: I am thine, O Lord; I have heard thy voice, And it told thy love to me, But I long to rise in the arms of faith, And be closer drawn to thee.
Consecrate me now to thy service, Lord By the power of grace divine; Let my soul look up with a steadfast hope, And my will be lost in thine.
O the pure delight of a single hour That before thy throne I spend, When I kneel in prayer, and with thee, my God I commune as friend with friend.
There are depths of love that I cannot know Till I cross the narrow sea; There are heights of joy that I may not reach Till I rest in peace with thee.
english.chorus: Draw me nearer, nearer, blessed Lord To the cross where thou hast died, Draw me nearer, nearer, nearer blessed Lord To thy precious bleeding side.

twi.title: MEYƐ WODE, NYAME
verses: Meyɛ Wode, Nyame mate wo nne ɛkaa wo dɛ kyerɛ me Na mepɛ sɛ mesrɛ gyedi mu Na metwe pini wo nkyɛn.
Nyame yi me si hɔ nnɛ ma wo som Wo dom no tumi no nti Ma me kra mfa anidasoɔ nkɔ w’akyi Na me pɛ mmɛn wo de mu.
W’ahendwa anim dɛnhwere biako Mame anigye kɛse Bere a mpaebom’ me ne wo, me Nyame Di nkɔmmɔ sɛ adamfo.
Ɛdɛ a ɛmu dɛ wɔ hɔ a nni nim Gyesɛ me twa ɛpo tea no Anigye pii wɔ hɔ a me renya Gyesɛ madu wo nkyɛn hɔ.
twi.chorus: Twe me bɛn yiye, yiye nhyirafoɔ Nyame Twe me bɛn w’asɛnnua no Twe me bɛn yiye, yiye nhyirafoɔ Nyame Twe me bɛn womfɛ mogya m’.

english.title: A CHARGE TO KEEP I HAVE
verses: A charge to keep I have, A God to glorify A never dying soul to save, And fit it for the sky.
To serve the present age, My calling to fulfill O may it all my powers engage To do my Master’s will
Help me to watch and pray, And on thy self rely, Assured if I my trust betray, I shall forever die.

twi.title: ASODIE DA ME SO
verses: Asodie da me so Sɛ mekamfo Nyame Mɛgye me kra a ɛnwu da nkwa Ma ɛfata soro.
Asom mmersanten yi Adi me dwuma no Anka me de made nyinaa Mayɛ me wura ne pɛ.
Ma menhwɛ me ho yiye Te sɛ me te wo nkyɛn Me wura, bɛboa wo somfoɔ Na mabu akontaa pa.
Ma menwɛn memɛ mpae Na mentwere wo nko Sɛ megoro m’adwuama ho a Mewu wu a enni awiei.

english.title: DƐN NA MENFA NYI WO AYƐ?
verses: Dɛn na menfa nyi wo ayɛ Tumi wura dasebrɛ? Fa wo honhom pa no ma me Na m’asɛm ayɛ wo fɛ Na wo dɛ nsɛnkyrɛne Ne wo dom no tra m’adwene Tumfoɔ ne ɛhene kɛseɛ Yɛda w’ase yi w’ayɛ.
Sɛ mekae me bɛne kwan a Mebobɛ mu ka pii no a ɛma me fɛre me tirim daa Sɛ wo hwɛ me so ara Na wo kura me hiani Na wo yɛ timɛbɛ ma me, Tumfoɔ ne ɛhene kɛse Yɛda w’ase yi w’ayɛ.

twi.title: DƐN NA MENFA NYI WO AYƐ?
verses: Dɛn na menfa nyi wo ayɛ Tumi wura dasebrɛ? Fa wo honhom pa no ma me Na m’asɛm ayɛ wo fɛ Na wo dɛ nsɛnkyrɛne Ne wo dom no tra m’adwene Tumfoɔ ne ɛhene kɛseɛ Yɛda w’ase yi w’ayɛ.
Sɛ mekae me bɛne kwan a Mebobɛ mu ka pii no a ɛma me fɛre me tirim daa Sɛ wo hwɛ me so ara Na wo kura me hiani Na wo yɛ timɛbɛ ma me, Tumfoɔ ne ɛhene kɛse Yɛda w’ase yi w’ayɛ.

english.title: WO A ME KOMA AFE WO
verses: Wo a me koma afe wo M’Agyenkwa no wo wɔ he? Yesu afa me yɛnko Na afei deɛ w’afa he?
Me kra ayɛ hahaaha sɛ Repɛ wo, me dɛfo pa Bɛne ama m’abrɛ sɛ ɛnti bra bɛgye me nkwa.
Me de mmɛborɔ nne me frɛ wo Yesu, ‘he po na wo kɛ? Hwee remma me nya ahotɛ Akosi sɛ me wu?
Sɛ menya nnomaa ntaban a Anka mɛtu ma kɛ Ma kɛ hwehwɛ wiem ne ‘soro Mahu deɛ Yesu wɔ.

twi.title: WO A ME KOMA AFE WO
verses: Wo a me koma afe wo M’Agyenkwa no wo wɔ he? Yesu afa me yɛnko Na afei deɛ w’afa he?
Me kra ayɛ hahaaha sɛ Repɛ wo, me dɛfo pa Bɛne ama m’abrɛ sɛ ɛnti bra bɛgye me nkwa.
Me de mmɛborɔ nne me frɛ wo Yesu, ‘he po na wo kɛ? Hwee remma me nya ahotɛ Akosi sɛ me wu?
Sɛ menya nnomaa ntaban a Anka mɛtu ma kɛ Ma kɛ hwehwɛ wiem ne ‘soro Mahu deɛ Yesu wɔ.

english.title: AN EMPTY MANSION
verses: Here I labor and toil as I look for a home, Just an humble abode among men, While in heaven a mansion is waiting for me And a gentle voice pleading, 'come in.'
Ever thankful am I that my Savior and Lord Promised unto the weary sweet rest; Nothing more could I ask than a mansion above, There to live with the saved and the blest.
When my labor and toiling have ended below And my hands shall lie folded in rest, I'll exchange this old home for a mansion up there And invite the arch angel as guest.
english.chorus: There's a mansion now empty, Just waiting for me, At the end of life's troublesome way, And I know that the Saviour will welcome me there Near the door of that mansion some day.

twi.title: ƐDAN HUNN BI
verses: Me yɛ adwuma brɛ sɛ Me hwehwɛ fie wɔ ha Baabi a mɛtena wɔ nnipa mu Bera a ɛsoro hɔ ɛdan bi retwɛn me Na ɛne brɛo bi ka sɛ, 'Bra Mu'.
Bere nyinaa me da m'Agyenkwa ne Awurade ase Sɛ ɔde hom ahyɛ abrɛfoɔ bɔ Me nhia biribi bio sɛ ɛdan wɔ soro hɔ a Me ne ahyirafoɔ bɛtena mu.
Sɛ m'adwuma ne brɛ pii yi Sa wɔ ase ha Na me de me nsa gu me bo so a Me de fie dada yi bɛsesa ɛsoro dan Na mato nsa afrɛ abɔfo.
twi.chorus: Ɛdan bi wɔ hɔ a Ɛmu da mpan retwɛnme Ɔbra yi akwan awieɛ no Na menim sɛ Agyenkwa no Bɛyɛ me atuu Ɛdan no apono ano da bi.

english.title: HALLELUJAH, WHAT A SAVIOR
verses: Man of sorrows, what a name For the Son of God who came Ruined sinners to reclaim Hallelujah! what a Savior.
Bearing shame and scoffing rude, In my place condemned He stood, Sealed my pardon with His blood; Hallelujah! what a Savior.
Guilty, vile and helpless we; Spotless Lamb of God was He; Full atonement can it be? Hallelujah! What a Savior.
Lifted up was He to die, It is finished, was His cry; Now in heaven exalted, Hallelujah! What a Savior.
When He comes, our glorious King, All His ransomed home to bring, Then a new this song we'll sing, Hallelujah! What a Savior.

twi.title: YEA NNIPA
verses: Yea nnipa monhwɛ din bi a Wɔde frɛ Nyame ba a Ɔbɛgye adasa nkwa Alleluia, gyefoɔ bɛn nie?
Wɔdii n'ho fɛw, n'ani wui Wɔde m'afɔdie soaa no Ne mogya si fafiri pi Alleluia, gyefoɔ bɛn nie?
Yɛdi fɔ, yɛn ho yɛ tan N'ɔyɛ Nyame mpata dwan Fafiri aba so ampa Alleluia, gyefoɔ bɛn nie?
Ɔsɛn wie mu na ɔwui Ɔteɛɛm sɛ afei m'awie Wɔama no so nnɛ wɔ soro Alleluia, gyefoɔ bɛn nie?
Sɛ yɛ anuonyam hene no ba a Bɛfan e nkurofoɔ no kɔ a Yɛbɛto saa nnwom yi bio Alleluia, gyefoɔ bɛn nie?

english.title: OVER THE SUNSET SEA
verses: Darkness is falling the night draweth nigh, Shadows fall dark on the lea; Voices of saved ones are beckoning come.
Our hearts are heavy as they journey on, Leaving a dear memory; Jesus is waiting to welcome them home.
When my long journey on this earth is o'er, Dear Lord, I'm coming to thee; Ever to rest in that heavenly home.
english.chorus: Over the sunset sea, Soon I shall journey to heaven my home, And from all sorrow be free; Harbor lights gleaming are lighting the way, Over the sunset sea.

twi.title: ƐPO NO AGYA HƆ
verses: Ɛsum reduru, anadwo reba Sunsum da asase no so. Wɔn a wɔagye wɔn no nne refrɛ sɛ bra Ɛpo no agya hɔ.
Sɛ adɔfo kɔ wɔn kra akyi a yɛn werɛ Ɛgya yɛn nkaeɛ pii Yesu retwɛn agye wɔn akɔ fie Ɛpo no agya hɔ.
Sɛ m'asase so akwantuo ba awieɛ a Owura pa mɛba wo nkyɛn Na m'abɛhome wɔ soro fie hɔ Ɛpo no agya hɔ.
twi.chorus: Ɛnkyɛ mɛtu kwan akɔ soro me fie Na me nni awerɛhoɔ bio Ɛpo ano kanea hyerɛn kwan no mu Ɛpo no agya hɔ.

english.title: BƆ MPAE MERE NYINAA
verses: Wiase ahwere mpaebɔ kwan Ahotefoɔ agyae mpaebɔ Adehwere kɛse paa ni O wɔn akoma ayɛ sum.
Agya no kasa wɔ n'asɛm mu Ɔmfa kwan foforɔ bi so Sɛ yɛ pɛ yɛne Awurade kasa Ɛwɔ sɛ yɛnya bere bɔ mpae.
Sɛ yɛyere yɛn ho bɔ mpae Wɔ Yesu din mu mere nyinaa a Yɛrenhu awerɛhoɔ, sɛhwɛ ne yea Wɔ ɛda biara mu.
english.chorus: Bɔ mpae anɔpa, bɔ mpae awiabere Bɔ mpae anwumere, bere a bi a bɔ mpae Bɔ mpae anigyeɛm, bɔ mpae awerɛhom Sɛhwɛ mu bɔ mpae, bɔ mpae mere nyinaa.

twi.title: BƆ MPAE MERE NYINAA
verses: Wiase ahwere mpaebɔ kwan Ahotefoɔ agyae mpaebɔ Adehwere kɛse paa ni O wɔn akoma ayɛ sum.
Agya no kasa wɔ n'asɛm mu Ɔmfa kwan foforɔ bi so Sɛ yɛ pɛ yɛne Awurade kasa Ɛwɔ sɛ yɛnya bere bɔ mpae.
Sɛ yɛyere yɛn ho bɔ mpae Wɔ Yesu din mu mere nyinaa a Yɛrenhu awerɛhoɔ, sɛhwɛ ne yea Wɔ ɛda biara mu.
twi.chorus: Bɔ mpae anɔpa, bɔ mpae awiabere Bɔ mpae anwumere, bere a bi a bɔ mpae Bɔ mpae anigyeɛm, bɔ mpae awerɛhom Sɛhwɛ mu bɔ mpae, bɔ mpae mere nyinaa.

english.title: THE GATE AJAR FOR ME
verses: There is a gate that stands ajar, And thru its portals gleaming, A radiance from the cross afar, The Savior's love revealing.
That gate ajar stands free for all Who seek thru it salvation; The rich and poor, the great and small Of every tribe and nation.
Press onward then, tho foes may frown, While mercy's gate is open; Accept the cross, and win the crown, Love's everlasting token.
Beyond the river's brink we'll lay The cross that here is given, And bear the crown of life away, And love Him more in heaven.
english.chorus: O depth of mercy, can it be That gate was left ajar for me? For me, for me? Was left ajar for me?

twi.title: ƐPONO NO ANO DA HƆ MAA ME
verses: Ɛpon bi wabue ato hɔ Na hann bi fi asɛndua ho Gyegye n'akwan no mu hyenhyɛn Yi gyefoɔ no dɛ adi.
Ɛpon no da hɔ ma nnipa a Wɔhyɛn mu hwehwɛ nkwagyeɛ Adɛfoɔ ne ahiafoɔ Aberempɔn ne ahohwifoɔ.
Sɛ atanfo muna mpo a pem so Ber'a adom pono no ano da hɔ yi Soa asɛndua kɔnya ahenkyɛ Ɔda ho daa adanseɛ.
Yɛdu asuogya no ho a Yɛ bɛ soɛ asɛndua no Na yɛakɔfa ahenkyɛ no Na yɛadɛ no soro hɔ akyɛn so.
twi.chorus: Ao ahumɔbɔ abun no ni Ɔbuee pon no too hɔ maa me Maa me! Maa me! Ɔbuee too hɔ maa me.

english.title: JESUS IS ALL THE WORLD TO ME
verses: Jesus is all the world to me, My life, my joy, my all; He is my strength from day to day, Without Him I would fall; When I am sad, to Him I go, no other one can cheer me so; When I am sad, he makes me glad, he's my friend.

Jesus is all the world to me, my friend in trials sore; I go to Him for blessings, and He gives them o'er and o'er; he sends the sunshine and the rain, he sends the harvest's golden grain; sunshine and rain, harvest of grain, he's my friend.

Jesus is all the world to me, and true to Him I'll be Oh, how could I this friend deny, When He's so true to me? Following Him I know I'm right, He watches o'er me day and night; Following Him, by day and night, he's my friend.

Jesus is all the world to me, I want no better friend; I trust Him now, I'll trust Him when life's fleeting days shall end Beautiful life with such a friend; Beautiful life that has no end; Eternal life, eternal joy, he's my friend.

twi.title: YESU YƐ ME WIASE NYINAA
verses: Yesu yɛ me wiase nyinaa Me nkwa, m'adeɛ nyinaa Ɔne m'ahoɔden daa nyinaa Ɔnni hɔ a mɛhwe ease Sɛ me werɛ ho a me kɔ ne nkyɛn Ɔbi nnye m'ani sɛ ɔno Sɛ me werɛ ho a ɔgye m'ani Ɔyɛ m'yɛnko.
Yesu yɛ me wiase nyinaa Ɔgye me sɛhwɛ mu Me kɔ ne nkyɛn kɔgye nhyira Na ɔma me moroso, ɔbɛ awoa na ɔtɛ nsuo Ɔma aduan ba twabere mu Awia ne nsuo, aduane nso Ɔyɛ m'yɛnko.
Yesu yɛ me wiase nyinaa Medi nokorɛ ama no Mentumi nyi yɛnko yi mma Berɛ a odi nokorɛ ma me Menim sɛ 'yɛ sɛ medi n'akyi Ɔhwɛ me so awia ne anadwo Mɛdi n'akyi awia ne anadwo Ɔyɛ m'yɛnko.
Yesu yɛ me wiase nyinaa Mempɛ yɛnko foforɔ Metwere n'seisei, mɛtwere no Berɛ a ɔbra nna yi bɛba awieɛ Yɛnko sei ma ɔbra yɛ dɛ Ɔbra dɛɛdɛ ɛnni awiei Daa nkwa, daa anigye Ɔyɛ m'yɛnko

english.title: LET JESUS DWELL WITHIN YOUR SOUL
verses: O will you now, from sighing cease? O will you seek the path of peace? Give Christ your heart, make heav'n your goal Let Jesus dwell within your soul
Thro trials oft, your soul must go The Saviour wills tis to be so Trust Him with all, as they of old, Let Jesus dwell within your soul.
Tho'sorrows come and troubles sore Trust in the Savior more and more, Tho'oft you've sinned, He'll make you whole Let Jesus dwell within your soul.
Poor sinners, hear, his voice of love Tis calling you to heav'n above Give Him your heart He'll make it whole Let Jesus dwell within your soul.
And when the hour, of death draws near Trust Him to take, away all fear The joys of heav'n will soon unfold, Let Jesus dwell within your soul.
english.chorus: Let Jesus dwell within your soul Let Jesus dwell within your soul Let joys increase as ages roll Let Jesus dwell within your soul.

twi.title: MA YESU NTENA W'AKOMA MU
verses: So wobɛgyae ahome gu Na wo ahwehwɛ asomdwoe kwan Ma Kristo kwan, wani nna soro Ma Yesu ntena w'akoma mu.
Wo kra bɛkɔ nsɛhwɛ mu Agyenkwa no nhwehwɛ no saa Gye no di yiye sɛ tetefoɔ Ma Yesu ntena w'akoma mu.
Awerɛho ne amaneɛ bɛba Fa wo ho to Agyenkwa no so Wo taa fom deɛ, ɔbɛte wo ho Ma Yesu ntena w'akoma mu.
Ɔbɛne tie ne dɛ nne no Ɛrefrɛ wo akɔ soro Fa w'koma ma no, ɔbɛte ho Ma Yesu ntena w'akoma mu.
Na sɛ owu dɛn no bɛn a Twere no sɛ ɔbeyi wo suro Na wo bɛhu ɛsoro anigye Ma Yesu ntena w'akoma mu.
twi.chorus: Ma Yesu ntena w'akoma mu Ma Yesu ntena w'akoma mu Ma w'ani ngye mere retwam yi Ma Yesu ntena w'akoma mu.

english.title: O THINK OF THE HOME OVER THERE
verses: O think of a home over there, By the side of the river of light, Where the saints all immortal and fair Are robed in their garments of white.
O think of the saints over there, Who before us the journey have trod, Of the songs that they breathe on the air, In their home in the palace of God.
My Saviour is now over there, There the saved and the saints are at rest; Then away from my sorrow and care, Let me fly to the land of the blest.
I'll soon be at home over there, For the end of my journey I see All the saints and the angels up there Are watching and waiting for me.
english.chorus: Over there, over there, o think of the home over there Over there, over there, o think of the saints over there Over there, over there, my savior is now over there Over there, over there, I'll soon be at home over there.

twi.title: DWENE NOHOAA ƐFIE NO HO
verses: Odwene nohoaa ɛfie no ho Wɔ hann asuten no hɔ Faako a wɔde ntadeɛ fitaa Hyehyɛ ahotefoɔ a wɔnwu da no.
O dwene nohoaa ahotefoɔ n'ho Wɔadi yɛn kan akwantu yi mu Dwene nnwom a wɔto no ho Wɔ wɔn fie, Nyame ahenfie hɔ.
M'Agyenkwa no wɔ nohoaa hɔ Deɛ ahotefoɔ home no Mɛgyae m'awerɛhoɔ ne adwendwenyi Sɛ mekɔ nhyira asaasa no so.
Ɛrenkyɛ na maku fie hɔ 'Fisɛ mehu m'akwantu n'awieɛ Na ɛsoro hɔ ahotefoɔ ne abɔfoɔ Retwɛn me na wɔrehwɛ me kwan.
twi.chorus: Nohoaa, nohoaa O dwene nohoaa ɛfie no ho. Nohoaa, nohoaa. O dwene nohoaa ɛfie no ho.

english.title: NOTHING BUT THE BLOOD
verses: What can wash away my sins? Nothing but the blood of Jesus What can make me whole again? Nothing but the blood of Jesus.
For my pardon this I see, Nothing but the blood of Jesus For my cleansing, this my plea, Nothing but the blood of Jesus.
Nothing can for sin atone, Nothing but the blood of Jesus Naught of good that I have done, Nothing but the blood of Jesus.
This is all my hope and peace, Nothing but the blood of Jesus This is all my righteousness, Nothing but the blood of Jesus.
english.chorus: Oh! Precious is the flow that makes me white as snow No other fount I know, nothing but the blood of Jesus.

twi.title: HWEE NNI HƆ SƐ YESU MOGYA
verses: Deɛn na ɛbɛhoro me bɔne? Hwee nni hɔ sɛ Yesu mogya Deɛn bɛma m'adi mu bio? Hwee nni hɔ sɛ Yesu mogya.
Sɛ mepɛ bɔne fafiri Hwee nni hɔ sɛ Yesu mogya Sɛ mepɛ ahoteɛ nso a Hwee nni hɔ sɛ Yesu mogya.
Hwee ntumi ntua bɔne ka Hwee nni hɔ sɛ Yesu mogya Ɛnyɛ papa bi a m'ayɛ Hwee nni hɔ sɛ Yesu mogya.
M'asomdwoe, anidasoɔ ni Hwee nni hɔ sɛ Yesu mogya Me tenenee nyinaa nso ni Hwee nni hɔ sɛ Yesu mogya.
twi.chorus: O mogya a ɛdim u Ɛte me ho fitaa Me nnim asuti bi Hwee ni hɔ sɛ Yesu mogya.

english.title: WONDERFUL WORDS OF LIFE
verses: Sing them over again to me, Wonderful words of life Let me more of their beauty see Wonderful words of life. Words of life and beauty, Teach me faith and duty
Christ, the blessed one, gives to all Wonderful words of life Sinner, list to the loving call Wonderful words of life All so freely given, Wooing us to heaven.
Sweetly echo the gospel call, Wonderful words of life Offer pardon and peace to all, wonderful words of life Jesus, only Savior, sanctify forever.
english.chorus: Beautiful words, wonderful words of life

twi.title: NKWASƐM NWANWA
verses: Si so to kyerɛ me bio Nkwasɛm a ɛyɛ nwanwa Ma menhu ne dɛ no mmoroso Nkwasɛm a ɛyɛ nwanwa Nsɛm a ɛma nkwa na ɛyɛ dɛ Kyerɛ me gyedi ne adwumayɛ.
Kristo hyirafoɔ de ma obi'aa Nkwasɛm a ɛyɛ nwanwa Ɔbɔne tie ne dɛ frɛ no Nkwasɛm a ɛyɛ nwanwa Ɔde ne nyinaa ma kwa Retwetwe yɛn akɔ soro.
Nsɛmpa nɛ no gyegye dɛɛdɛ Nkwasɛm a ɛyɛ nwanwa Ɔma fafiri ne asomdwoe Nkwasɛm a ɛyɛ nwanwa Yesu nko ne Agyenkwa Ɔte yɛn ho daa nyinaa.
twi.chorus: Nsɛm a ɛyɛ dɛ, nsɛm nwanwa Nkwasɛm ɛyɛ nwanwa.

english.title: CLOSE TO THEE
verses: Thou, my everlasting portion More than friend or life to me; All along my pilgrim journey, Savior,let me walk with thee.
Not for ease or worldly pleasure, Nor for fame my prayer shall be Gladly will I toil and suffer, Only let me walk with thee.
Lead me thru the vale of shadows, Bear me o'er life's fitful sea; Then the gate of life eternal May I enter, Lord with thee.
english.chorus: Close to thee, close to thee, close to thee

twi.title: MƐBƐN WO
verses: Wo yɛ m'ade nyinaa daa Wo kyɛn me nkwa mpo Wɔ m'akwantu nyinaa mu Owura me ne wo nnante.
Me mpaebɔ nnyɛ wiase deɛ Anaa anuonyam hunu pɛ Anigyeɛm, ɔbrɛm, amanesɛm Wo deɛ ma me ne w'nkɔ mu.
Kyerɛ me kwan sunsum bɔn mu Fa me twa ɔbra po no Na ma me ne wo nhyɛn daa Nkwa ɔpon kɛseɛ no mu.
twi.chorus: Mɛbɛn wo,mɛbɛn wo, mɛbɛn wo, Wɔ m'akwantu nyinaa mu Gyefoɔ me ne wo nnante.

english.title: I AM COMING TO THE CROSS
verses: I am coming to the cross; I am poor and weak and blind; I am counting all but dross; I shall full salvation find.
Long my heart has sighed for thee; Long has evil reigned within Now thy message comes to me, I will cleanse thee from all sin.
Here I give my all to thee, Friends and time and earthly store, Soul and body thine to be, Wholly thine for ever more.
Gladly I accept thy grace, Gladly I obey thy word All thy promises embraces, O my Savior and my Lord.
english.chorus: Awurade me twere wo O Kalvary Adwamaa Me koto w'asεndua ase Me hwehwε wo nkwagyeε no.

twi.title: MEREBA W'ASεNDUA ASE
verses: Mereba w'asεndua ase Meyε furaefoƆ mmƆbƆrƆni Me bu ade nyinaa hunu Mεnya nkwahosan wƆ hƆ.
M'akoma fee wo akyε BƆne adi mu hene akyε Wo nsεmpa aba me hƆ sε Mεhoro wo ho bƆne nyinaa.
Mede m'ade nyinaa ma wo Honam mu ade nyinaa Me kra ne me nipadua εnyε wo dea daa nyinaa.
Me gye w'adom anigyeε m' Me de anigyeε tie w'asεm Me gye wo bƆhyε nyinaa O m'Agyenkwa , m'Awurade.
twi.chorus: Awurade me twere wo O Kalvary Adwamaa Me koto w'asεndua ase Me hwehwε wo nkwagyeε no.

english.title: WHEN THE ROLL IS CALLED UP YONDER
verses: When the trumpet of the Lord shall sound Earth time shall be no more, And the morning breaks eternal bright and fair; When the saved of earth shall gather over on the other shore and the roll is called up yonder, I'll be there.

On that bright and glorious morning when the dead in Christ shall rise, and the glory of His resurrection share when His chosen ones shall gather to their home beyond the skies, and the roll is called up yonder, I'll be there.

Let us labor for the Master from the dawn till setting sun, let us talk of all His wondrous love and care; then when all of life is over and our work on earth is done and the roll is called up yonder, I'll be there.
english.chorus: When the roll is called up yonder When the roll is called up yonder When the roll is called up yonder I'll be there.

twi.title: BERE A WƆBOBƆ DIN
verses: Ber' a Awurade abεn bεbom Na bere nyinaa asa no Na anƆpa hann fεεfε no rentƆ da WƆ mpoano foforƆ hƆ no Na wƆbobƆ din wƆ soro hƆ a meka ho.
AnƆpa hann no mu, na Kristo mu awufoƆ bεsƆre Na yεakƆ ne wusƆre anuonyam mu Ɔbεboa ne deε ano wƆ wƆn soro fie hƆ no Na wƆbobƆ din wƆ soro hƆ a meka ho.
Ma yεnyε Owura n'adwuma da mu no nyinaa ara Na yεnka ne dƆ nwanwa ho asεm Sε yεyε yεn adwuma wie na yεn nkwa nyinaa sa a Na wƆbobƆ din wƆ soro hƆ a meka ho.
twi.chorus: Sε wƆbobƆ din wƆ soro hƆ a Sε wƆbobƆ din wƆ woro hƆ a meka ho.

english.title: ALL HAIL THE POWER
verses: All hail the power of Jesus' name; Let angels prostrate fall Let angels prostrate fall They bro't the royal diadem And crown Him Lord of all
Ye chosen seed of Israel's race, Ye ransomed from the fall, Hail Him who saves you by His grace, The crowned King Lord of all
Let every kindred, every tribe On this terrestrial ball, To Him all majesty ascribe And praise Him, King of all
O that with yonder sacred throng We at His feet may fall We'll join the everlasting song And praise Him Judge of all.

twi.title: MONKAMFO YESU DIN
verses: Monyinaa monkamfo Yesu din AbƆfoƆ mutu fam Momfa ahenkyε mεhyε no Na monsi no ƆhempƆn.
Mo Israel mma a wƆapa mo Ayi mo asehweε mu Monkamfo nea Ɔgye mo nkwa Na monsi no hempƆn.
Moma abusua ne Kana nyinaa WƆ asaase yi so Mfa tumi nyinaa mma no Na monyi hempƆn ayε.
Ao, anka yεn ne sorofoƆ Atwa ahwe ne nana se AbƆ mu ato daa nnwom no Na yεasi no hempƆn.

english.title: HEAR ME NOW
verses: Hear me now o gentle Savior, Hear my humble plea While to God in prayer I'm calling Intercede for me
Let me at thy throne of mercy Find a sweet relief; Kneeling there in deep contrition Help my unbelief
Trusting always in thy merit Would I seek thy face Heal my wounded broken spirit. Save me by thy grace.
Thou the Spring of all my comfort More than life to me, Whom have I on earth beside thee Whom in heaven but thee?
english.chorus: Savior, Savior, hear my humble cry

twi.title: MPA ME HO
verses: Mpa me ho gyefoƆ brεfoƆ Tie me mmƆborƆ su Worefrεfrε ebinom yi Mpa me nko ho.
MmƆborƆ ahenwa anim ha Ma me akomatom, Mekotot ha awerεhoƆ mu Na yi m'akyinnye.
Metwere wo yiye nkutoo Me hwehwε w'anim Sa me honhom pirafoƆ yadeε Gye me w'adom so.
M'awerεkyekye nsu aniwa Wo kyεn me nkwa mpo Hwan na mewƆ ase ha Anaa soro sε wo?
twi.chorus: GyefoƆ, gyefoƆ Tie me mmƆborƆ su Na worfrε ebinom yi Mpa me nko ho.

english.title: REVIVE US AGAIN
verses: We praise thee, o God For the Son of thy love For Jesus who died and is now gone above.
We praise thee, o God, For thy Spirit of light, Who has shown us our Saviour, And scattered our night.
All glory and praise to the Lamb that was slain Who has borne all our sins, and has cleansed every stain.
english.chorus: Hallelujah! Thine the glory, Hallelujah! Amen! Hallelujah! Thine the glory, Revive us again.

twi.title: NYAME YEYI W'AYε
verses: Nyame yeyi w'ayε Wo dƆba no nti Yesu a owui na ƆkƆ soro hƆ.
Nyame yeyi w'ayε Wo hann honhom no a Wakyerε yεn Agyenkwa Na ayi yεn sum no.
Nuonyam ayεyi Nka adwamaa a owui Wasa yεn bƆne Na wayi yεn fi nyinaa.
Nuonyam ayεyi Nka Adam NyankopƆn A watƆ yεn ahwehwε Akyerε yεn kwan.
twi.chorus: Alleluia nuonyam nka wo Alleluia Amen Alleluia nuonyam nka wo Kanyan yεn bio.

english.title: JESUS, SAVIOR, PILOT ME
verses: Jesus, Savior, pilot me, Over life's tempestuous sea; Unknown waves before me roll, Hiding rocks and treach'rous shoal
As a mother stills her child, Thou canst hush the ocean wild Boist'rous waves obey thy will When thou say'st to them, be still
When at last I near the shore, And the fearful breakers roar Twixt me and the peaceful rest Then, while leaning on thy breast.

twi.title: GYEFOƆ YESU KYERε ME KWAN
verses: GyefoƆ Yesu kyerε me kwan Ɔbra ahum po no so Asorekye adi m'anim Abotan ahunta me ƆkwankyerεfoƆ ne wo GyefoƆ Yesu kyerε me kwan.
Sε εna kyε ne ba so no Wo tumi hyε po no so Asorokye mpo tie wo nne Sε wo see wƆn sε yε komm Po so tumfoƆ nwanwani GyefoƆ Yesu kyerε me kwan.
Awiei n'mebεn mpoano hƆ a Na ƆsεefoƆ bobεm a Me ne Ɔhomeε ntam no Ber'a metwere wo kokom Mete wo ne a εse Nsuro mεkyerε wo kwan.

english.title: I BRING MY SINS TO THEE
verses: I bring my sins to thee, The sins I cannot count That all may cleansed be In thy once opened fount.
I bring my grief to thee, The grief I cannot tell No word shall need of be Thou knowest all so well.
My life I bring to thee I would not be my own, O Savior let me be Thine ever, thine alone.
english.chorus: I bring them, Savior, all to thee I bring the sorrow laid on me My heart, my life, my all I bring The burden is too great for me O suffering Savior all to thee To thee my Savior and my King.

twi.title: MEDE ME BƆNE BRε WO
verses: Mede me bƆne a Mentumi nkan brε wo Na woahoro me ho Wo mogya abura no mu M'Agyenkwa me de mebrε wo Ne duru hyε me so dodo.
Mede dadwene a Mentumi nguan brε wo WorensƆ me mu nko Wo bεsoa ama me M'Agyenkwa dƆfoƆ, wonkyεn na Mede m'adesoa yi m'aba.
Mede me koma a Mennim mu nsεm brε wo DaadaafoƆ kobƆfoƆ Koma bƆne ampa M'Agyenkwa mede hyε wo nsa Ma εntim, εnyε nokwafoƆ
Mede me nkwa brε wo Me nna so ne me ho M'Agyenkwa ma me nyε Wonko wo dea daa Mekoma, nkwa, m'ade nyinaa Mede brε wo, he Hene, GyefoƆ.
twi.chorus: I bring them, Savior, all to thee I bring the sorrow laid on me My heart, my life, my all I bring The burden is too great for me O suffering Savior all to thee To thee my Savior and my King.

english.title: NO NOT ONE
verses: There's not a friend like the lowly Jesus, No not one, no not one None else could heal all our soul's disease, No not one, no not one
No friend like him is so high and holy, No not one, no not one And yet no friend is so meek and lowly, No not one, no not one.
There's not an hour that He is not near us No not one, no not one No night so dark but His love can cheer us No not one, no not one.
Did ever saint find this Friend forsake him? No not one, no not one Or sinner find that He would not take him? No not one, no not one.
Was e'er a gift like the Savior given? No not one, no not one. Will He refuse saints a home in heaven; No not one, no not one.
english.chorus: Jesus knows all about our struggles He will guide till the day is done There's not a friend like the lowly Jesus No not one, no not one.

twi.title: OBI NNI HƆ
verses: Adamfo bi nni hƆ sε Yesu no Bi nni hƆ, bi nni hƆ Obi nni hƆ a otumi sa yεn yare Bi nni hƆ, bi nni hƆ.
Adamfo bi nni hƆ Ɔkron, ne ho te Bi nni hƆ, bi nni hƆ. Na adamfoƆ bi nni hƆ a ƆdwoƆ Bi nni hƆ, bi nni hƆ.
Bere biara nni hƆ a Ɔmmεn yεn Bi nni hƆ, bi nni hƆ Sum nni hƆ, ne dƆ kyekye yεn werε Bi nni hƆ, bi nni hƆ.
Wayi ahotefoƆ bi ama pεn? Bi nni hƆ, bi nni hƆ Anaa wangye ƆbƆnefoƆ bi pεn Bi nni hƆ, bi nni hƆ.
Akyεdeε bi sen agyenkwa yi anaa? Bi nni hƆ, bi nni hƆ Ɔbεyi ahotefoƆ ama εsoro hƆ Bi nni hƆ, bi nni hƆ.
twi.chorus: Yesu nim yεn haw nyinaa ara Ɔbεdi yε'anim merε nyinaa Adamfo bi nni hƆ sε Yesu Bi nni hƆ, bi nni hƆ.

english.title: THE CHURCH'S ONE FOUNDATION
verses: The church's one foundation is Jesus Christ our Lord She is His new creation by water and the word From heaven he came and sought her To be his holy bride With his own blood he bought her And for her life he died.

Elect from every nation, yet one o'er all the earth Her charter of Salvation, one Lord, one faith, one birth One holy name she blesses, partakes one holy food, And to one hope she presses, with every grace endued.

Mid toil and tribulation and tumult of her war She waits the consummation of peace forever more Till, with the vision glorious, Her longing eyes are blest And the great church victorious shall be the church at rest. Amen.

twi.title: ASAFO NO FAPEM
verses: Asafo no fapem koro Ne yεn Wura Yesu Ɔnam nsuo ne N'asεm so Yεε N'abƆdeε foforƆ Ofi soro bεhwehwεε no Yεε N'ayeforƆ kronkron Ɔde ne mogya tƆƆ no Ne nkwa nti na owui.
WƆpa no fi amanaman mu Nanso Ɔyε asafo koro Ne nkagyeε tumi no ni Wura koro, gyidie koro Ohyira din kronkron biako Di n'aduan kronkron no AnidasoƆ koro na Ɔporo Adom nyinaa wƆ mu.
Sε nnipa si n'atweetwe Hwε n'ahokyerε kεseε Mpaapaamu a atete mu Ne nkyerkyerε bƆne a AhotefoƆ no wεn su Sε: εnkosi da bεn? Anadwo su renkyε Na adan anƆpa dwom

english.title: MEDE KOMA A YEA AHYε NO MA
verses: Mede koma a yea ahyε no ma Awurade na merefrε wo W'adom ahummƆbƆ so pii Me NyankopƆn hu me mmƆbƆ.
Mede me nsa hwe me bo so Fodie duruduru ahyε meso Kristo asεnnua ne me su Me NyankopƆn hu me mmƆbƆ
Megyina akyiri me nusu agu Na mentumi menhwε soro Wo na wohu me yea nyinaa Me NyankopƆn hu me mmƆbƆ
WopƆn me fi bƆne gya mu Na me ne adehyeε kuo no kƆtra a M'anigyeε nnwom daa bεyε sε NyankopƆn ahu me mmƆbƆ.

twi.title: MEDE KOMA A YEA AHYε NO MA
verses: Mede koma a yea ahyε no ma Awurade na merefrε wo W'adom ahummƆbƆ so pii Me NyankopƆn hu me mmƆbƆ.
Mede me nsa hwe me bo so Fodie duruduru ahyε meso Kristo asεnnua ne me su Me NyankopƆn hu me mmƆbƆ
Megyina akyiri me nusu agu Na mentumi menhwε soro Wo na wohu me yea nyinaa Me NyankopƆn hu me mmƆbƆ
WopƆn me fi bƆne gya mu Na me ne adehyeε kuo no kƆtra a M'anigyeε nnwom daa bεyε sε NyankopƆn ahu me mmƆbƆ.

english.title: YIELD NOT TO TEMPTATION
verses: Yield not to temptation, For yielding is sin Each vict'ry will help you some other to win Fight manfully onward Dark passions subdue, look ever to Jesus, He will carry you thru
Shun evil companions, bad language disdain God's name hold in reverence, nor take it in vain Be thoughtful and earnest, kindhearted and true Look ever to Jesus, he will carry you thru.
To Him that o'er cometh, God giveth a crown, Thru faith we shall conquer, tho often cast down He, who is our Saviour, our strength will renew Look ever to Jesus, he will carry you thru.
english.chorus: Ask the Saviour to help you, comfort strengthen and keep You He is willing to aid you, he will carry you thru.

twi.title: MMA SƆHWε NNI WO SO
verses: Mma sƆhwε nni wo so Na saaa yε bƆne Nim biako bεboa wo Ma woadi nim bio Ko mmarimmaso daa Di wakƆnnƆ so Hwε Yesu ara daa Ɔbε ye wo afi mu.
Gyae fekuo bƆne no Ne kasa bƆne nyinaa Di Nyame ne din nni Na mfa nni agorƆ Dwene na yε nsiyε Yε adƆe, di nokorε Hwε Yesu ara daa. Ɔbεyi wo afi mu.
Nea Ɔbεdi nim no Nyame bεhyε n'kyε Sε yεtaa yε merε mpo a Gyidie bedi nim Nea Ɔyε yεn gyefoƆ Ɔbεhyε yεn den Hwε Yesu ara daa Ɔbεyi wo afi mu.
twi.chorus: Serε Agyenkwa no hƆ mmoa Denhyε ne awerεkyekye Ɔpε sε Ɔbεboa wo Ɔbε yi wo afi mu.

english.title: OLIVE'S BROW
verses: Tis midnight and on Olive's brow The star is dimmed that lately shone Tis midnight in the garden now, The suff'ring Savior prays alone.
Tis midnight and from all removed The Savior wrestles lone with fears E'en the disciples whom He loved Sleep while the Master grieves in tears.
Tis midnight and for others guilt The man of sorrows sweats as blood Yet he who hath in anguish knelt Is not forsaken by his God.
Tis midnight, and from ether plains Is borne the song that angels know Unheard by mortals are the strains That sweetly soothe the Savior's woe.

twi.title: ƆDASUOM OLIVE BEPƆ SO
verses: Ɔdasuom Olive bepƆ so Nsoroma n'ahyerεn no aduru sum Ɔdasuom wƆ turo mu hƆ Yεn Agyenkwa no nko bƆ mpae.
Ɔdasuom na obi nni hƆ Agyenkwa no ne suro ko Asuafo mpa a ƆdƆ no Ada ber'a wura no te nnusuo.
Ɔdasuom afƆdifoƆ nti Yea nip ate mogya fifire Ɔno a ƆkotƆ yea mu Nanso ne Nyame ampa no.
Ɔdasuom sareso man nyinaa AbƆfoƆ nnwom ahyε hƆ ma AwufoƆ ante nkekaeε denhyε a εdwodwoo Agyenkwa haw no.

english.title: BRA AGYENKWA HƆ
verses: Bra Agyenkwa hƆ, nkyε koraa W'akyerε yεn kan wƆ n'asem mu ha Ogyina yεn mfinmfini ha nnε Reka no brεε sε bra.
Bra Agyenkwa hƆ, tie ne nne Koma nyinaa nni ahurusie Na yεnfa no nyε yεn fam deε Monnkyε koraa, mo mmra.
Dwen prεko bio, sε ƆwƆ ha nnε Bu ne nhira frε no bi na di so Tie n'awεse nne rewoso sε Bra Agyenkwa hƆ, bra.
english.chorus: Nhyiamu no bεyε anigye Da a yεn koma befi bƆne ho Na yεne wo Agyenkwa bƆtena Yεn daa fie no mu.

twi.title: BRA AGYENKWA HƆ
verses: Bra Agyenkwa hƆ, nkyε koraa W'akyerε yεn kan wƆ n'asem mu ha Ogyina yεn mfinmfini ha nnε Reka no brεε sε bra.
Bra Agyenkwa hƆ, tie ne nne Koma nyinaa nni ahurusie Na yεnfa no nyε yεn fam deε Monnkyε koraa, mo mmra.
Dwen prεko bio, sε ƆwƆ ha nnε Bu ne nhira frε no bi na di so Tie n'awεse nne rewoso sε Bra Agyenkwa hƆ, bra.
twi.chorus: Nhyiamu no bεyε anigye Da a yεn koma befi bƆne ho Na yεne wo Agyenkwa bƆtena Yεn daa fie no mu.

english.title: SAFE IN THE ARMS OF JESUS
verses: Safe in the arms of Jesus, safe on His gentle breast There by his love o'er shaded, sweetly my soul shall rest Hark! Tis the voice of angels, borne in a song to me Over the fields of glory, over the jasper sea.

Safe in the arms of Jesus, safe from corroding care Safe from the world's temptations, Sin cannot harm me there Free from the blight of sorrow, free from my doubts and fears, only a few more trials, only a few more tears.

Jesus, my heart's dear refuge, Jesus has died for me Firm on the rock of ages, ever my trust shall be Here let me wait with patience, wait till the night is o'er Wait till I see the morning break on the golden shore
english.chorus: Safe in the arms of Jesus, safe on his gentle breast There by his love o'er shaded, sweetly my soul shall rest.

twi.title: MEDA YESU BASA MU FƆMM
verses: Meda Yesu asa m'fƆmm Metwere ne bo mu komm Ne dƆ no kata me so Me kra bεhome hƆ komm. Tie abƆfo nne a WƆde reto nnwom frε me Fri anuonyam srε no so Fri εpo no agya hƆ.
Meda Yesu basa m'fƆmm Mafi adwendwene mu Mafi wiase ngyegyeε mu BƆne ntumi nha me hƆ Aka nsƆhwε kakraa bi Aka nisuo kakraa bi Na mafi awerεhoƆ mu Na mafi suro mu.
Yesu me koma dwankƆbea Yesu awu ama me Tete boƆ no so denden Na me wereε tim daa nyinaa Ha na mede aboterε twεn Ama adesae atwa m' Mεtwεn ahu adekyee WƆ asuo n'agya hƆ.
twi.chorus: Meda Yesu basa m'fƆmm Metwere ne bo mu komm Ne dƆ no kata me so Me kra bεhome hƆ komm.

english.title: HE LOVED ME SO
verses: Why did my Savior come to earth And to the humble go? Why did he choose a lowly birth? Because he loved me so
Why did He drink the bitter cup of sorrow, pain and woe Why on the cross be lifted up? Because he loved me so
Till Jesus comes I'll sing his praise And then to glory go, And live with him thru endless days Because he loved me so.
english.chorus: He loved me so, he loved me so He gave his precious life for me, for me Because he loved me so.

twi.title: ADεN NA ƆDƆ ME SAA?
verses: Adεn na m'Agyenkwa baa asase so AhobrεasefoƆ ho? Na Ɔpa ahobrεaseε awoƆ? Fisε ƆdƆ me saa.
Adεn na Ɔnom amane ne yea Kuruwa nwononwono ano? Adεn na Ɔsεnee asεnnua no ho? Fisε ƆdƆ me saa.
Mεto n'ayeyie dwom na waba Na makƆ n'anuonyam mu Na me ne no atena nna nyinaa Fisε ƆdƆ me saa.
twi.chorus: ƆdƆ me saa, ƆdƆ me saa Ɔde ne nkwa a εsom boƆ maa me Fisε ƆdƆ me saa.

english.title: SEND THE LIGHT
verses: There's a call comes ringin o'er the restless wave, Send the light, send the light There are souls to rescue, there are souls to save Send the light, send the light
We have heard the Macedonian call today, Send the light, send the light And a golden off'ring at the cross we lay Send the light, send the light.
Let us pray that grace may every where abound Send the light, send the light And a Christ-like spirit every where be found Send the light, send the light
Let us not grow weary in the work of love Send the light, send the light Let us gather jewels for a crown above Send the light, send the light.
english.chorus: Send the light, send the light The blessed gospel light, let it shine from shore to shore Shine forever more.

twi.title: FA HANN NO BRA
verses: εnne bi refrε wo εpo no so Fa hann n'bra, fra hann n'bra εsε sε yeyi akra na yεgye wƆn Fa hann no bra, fa hann bra.
Yεate Makedonea frε no εnnε Fa hann n'bra, fa hann bra Yεde yεn afƆdeε ba asεnnua nase Fa hann no bra, fa hann bra.
Ma yεnserε na adom mu so baabiara Fa hann n'bra, fa hann bra Na Kristo Honhom atena baabiara Fa hann n'bra, fa hann bra.
Mma yεnnyε mmerε dƆ adwuma no mu Fa hann n'bra, fa hann bra Na yεmpε soro ahenkyε nhyehyε Fa hann n'bra, fa hann bra.
twi.chorus: Fa hann bra, nhyira nsεmpa hann no Ma εnhyerεn, wƆ mma nyinaa Fa hann bra nhyira nsεmpa hann no Ma εnhyerεn daadaa nyinaa.

english.title: OH! WHY NOT TONIGHT?
verses: Oh! Do not let the word depart, And close thine eyes against the light Poor sinner, harden not your heart Be saved, oh, tonight.
Tomorrow's sun may never rise To bless thy long deluded sight This is the time, oh, then be wise, Be saved, oh, tonight.
Our Lord in pity lingers still, And wilt thou thus his love requite Renounce at once thy stubborn will Be saved, oh tonight.
Our blessed Lord refuses none, Why would to Him their souls unite Believe, obey, the work is done Be saved, oh, tonight.
english.chorus: Oh, why not tonight? Oh why not tonight? Wilt thou be saved? Then why not tonight?

twi.title: ADεN NA εNYε ANADWO YI?
verses: Omma asεm no mpa wo ho Na nnkata w'ani mma hann no BƆneyεfoƆ mmpirim wo koma Nya nkwa anadwo yi.
Ɔkyena ebia na owia amfi Ahyira danifuarae no so Bere no ni hu nyansa Nya nkwa anadwo yi.
Yεn Ynbame ahummƆbrƆ wƆ hƆ Na wo bεtua ne dƆ so ka? Po wo pε bƆne no seisei Nya nkwa anadwo yi.
Wiase nni hwee de rema Enni anigyeε foforƆ biara Hwehwε Kristoni asetena Nya nka anadwo yi.
Yεn Awurade mpo biara A Ɔde ne kra bεma no Gyedi, yε asotie na wawie Nya nkwa anadwo yi.
twi.chorus: Adεn na εnyε anadwo yi? εsε sε wo nya nkwa Adεn na εnyε anadwo yi?

english.title: WHOSOEVER WILL
verses: Whosoever heareth, shout, shout the sound Spread the blessed tidings all the world around, Tell the joyful news wherever man is found.
Whosoever cometh, need not delay Now the door is open Enter while you may Jesus is the true, the only living way;
Whosoever will the promise is secure, Whosoever will, forever must endure, Whosoever will tis life forever more.
english.chorus: Whosoever will may come, whosoever will Send the proclamation over vale and hill Tis a loving Father calls the wand'rer home Whosoever will may come.

twi.title: OBIARA A ƆPε MMRA
verses: Teεm denden ka asεm no ma obiara nte Trε nsεmpa no mu wƆ wiase nyinaa Trε anigyeε nsεm no mu nea nnipa wƆ Obiara a Ɔpε no mmra.
Obiara a Ɔpε sε Ɔba no nyε ntεm W'abue pon n'ano, fa wo pε hyεn mu Yesu ne nokorε nkwa ne kwan no Obiara a Ɔpε no mmra.
Obiara a Ɔpε no bεhyε no yε ne de Obiaraa a Ɔpε bεtena hƆ daa Obiara a Ɔpε benya nkwa afebƆƆ Obiara a Ɔpε no mmra.
twi.chorus: Obiara a Ɔpε, obiara a Ɔpε Fa asεmpa no kƆ kokoƆ so ne abƆn mu Agya dƆfoƆ no frε akobƆfo aba fie Obiara a Ɔpε no mmra.

english.title: THERE IS POWER IN THE BLOOD
verses: Would you be free from your burden of sin? There's pow'r in the blood, power in the blood Would you o'er a victory win? There's wonderful pow'r in the blood.
Would you be free from your passion and pride? There's pow'r in the blood, pow'r in the blood Come for a cleansing to Calvary's tide There's wonderful pow'r in the blood.
Would you be whiter, much whiter than snow? There's pow'r in the blood, pow'r in the blood Sin stains are lost in its life giving flow There's wonderful pow'r in the blood.
Would you do service for Jesus your King There's pow'r in the blood, pow'r in the blood Would you live daily, his praises to sing?
english.chorus: There's pow'r, pow'r, wonder working pow'r In the blood of the Lamb There's pow'r, pow'r wonder working pow'r In the precious blood of the Lamb

twi.title: TUMI WƆ MOGYA NO MU
verses: Wo befi bεne adesoa no ase? Tume wƆ mogya n'mu, wƆ mogya n'mu Wo bedi bƆne so nkonim? Anwanwa tumi wƆ mogya no mu.
Wo befi yea ne ahomasoƆ mu? Tumi wƆ mogya n'mu, mogya no mu Bra Kalvary na wo ho bεfi Anwanwa tumi wƆ mogya no mu.
Wo ho bεte fitaa sε sukyerεma? Tumi wƆ mogya n'mu, mogya no mu BƆne nkakae yera ne nkwa a εresen mu Anwanwa tume wƆ mogya no mu.
twi.chorus: Tumi bi wƆ hƆ εyε nwanwa dwuma Odwanmaa mogya n'mu Tumi bi wƆ hƆ εyε nwanwa dwuma Odwanmma mogya no mu.

english.title: BRING THEM IN
verses: Hark! Tis the shepherd's voice I hear Out in the desert dark and drear Calling the lambs who've gone astray Far from the shepherd's fold away.
Who'll go and help this shepherd kind Help Him the little lambs to find? Who'll bring the lost ones to fold Where they'll be shelter'd from the cold?
Out in the desert hear their cry, Out on the mountain wild and high Hark! Tis the Master speaks to thee, Go find My lambs wher'er they be.
english.chorus: Bring them in, bring them in Bring them in from the fields of sin Bring them in, bring them in Bring the wand'ring ones to Jesus.

twi.title: FA WƆN BRA
verses: Tie, mete Odwanhwεfo no nne Fi srε so Ɔyea sum no mu Refrε nwanmaa a w'ayera Fi OdwanhwεfoƆ ban no mu.
Hwan bεkƆ Odwanhwεfo yi mmoa? Akεhwehwε nnwanmaa no Na Ɔde akobƆfo aba fie? Akata wƆn so awƆ no mu?
Tie wƆn su firi srε no so Fi bepƆ no atifi hƆ Tie owura no rese wo sε Kεhwehwε me nnwan maa nea wƆ wƆ.
twi.chorus: Fa wƆn bram, fa wƆn bram Fa wƆn fi bƆne no mu bra Fa wƆn bra, fa wƆn bra Fa akobƆfoƆ brε Yesu.

english.title: YεN NYAME TE ASE
verses: Nyame bi wƆ wiem akyiri hƆ a Wahinta afi nnipa ani so Ɔde Ɔsoro birii ewiem Na Ɔde ne tum' no yεε wiase.
Tete merε bi a atwam no AdiyifoƆ tee Nyame no nne Ɔne Nyame a εwƆ sε yε hu Ɔkasa fi ne nsεm kronkron m'.
Ɔde nkwa asie nnipa adwene Nyame kura naboaa wƆ ne nsam Nnipa hwehwε mpo a wƆ'nhu Fi sε Nyame nko na Ɔte ase.
WƆsεn yεn Nyame ba dua so Ɔfii ne pεm de ne nkwa maeε Sε Ɔbεgye nnipa afi bƆne m' Na yε ne no atena daa daa.
english.chorus: Nyame bi wƆ hƆ. Ɔte ase Yεte ne mu na yε nya nkwa Ɔde dƆteε na yεε nnipa Nyame kεse ƆwƆ hƆ daa.

twi.title: YεN NYAME TE ASE
verses: Nyame bi wƆ wiem akyiri hƆ a Wahinta afi nnipa ani so Ɔde Ɔsoro birii ewiem Na Ɔde ne tum' no yεε wiase.
Tete merε bi a atwam no AdiyifoƆ tee Nyame no nne Ɔne Nyame a εwƆ sε yε hu Ɔkasa fi ne nsεm kronkron m'.
Ɔde nkwa asie nnipa adwene Nyame kura naboaa wƆ ne nsam Nnipa hwehwε mpo a wƆ'nhu Fi sε Nyame nko na Ɔte ase.
WƆsεn yεn Nyame ba dua so Ɔfii ne pεm de ne nkwa maeε Sε Ɔbεgye nnipa afi bƆne m' Na yε ne no atena daa daa.
twi.chorus: Nyame bi wƆ hƆ. Ɔte ase Yεte ne mu na yε nya nkwa Ɔde dƆteε na yεε nnipa Nyame kεse ƆwƆ hƆ daa.

english.title: STEPPING IN THE LIGHT
verses: Trying to walk in the steps of the Savior, Trying to follow our Savior and king, Shaping our lives by His blessed example Happy, how happy, the songs that we bring
Pressing more closely to Him who is leading When we are tempted to turn from the way Trusting the arm that is strong to defend us, Happy, how happy, our praises each day.
Trying to walk in the steps of the Savior, Upward, still upward we'll follow our guide When we shall see Him, the King in His beauty Happy, how happy our place at his side.
english.chorus: How beautiful to walk in the steps of the Savior stepping in the light, stepping in the light How beautiful to walk in the steps of the Savior, Led in the paths of light.

twi.title: MESI HANN NO MU
verses: Yεrenante Agyenkwa anamεn mu Yεredi yεn Agyenkwa ne hene akyi Yεde ne nsεnnahƆ no bu yεn bra Nigye, anigye nwom na yεde ba.
Yεtwe pini deε Ɔdi yeanim no ho Sε sƆhwε ma yεfi kwan no mu a Yεdan basa denden εbƆ yεn ho ban Nigye mu na yεyi n'ayε daa.
Yεrenante Agyenkwa anamεn mu Yεdi yε kwankyerεfoƆ n'akyi kƆ soro Sε yεhu yεn hene wƆ n'ahoƆfεm Nigye mu na yεbεtena ne nkyεn.
twi.chorus: εyε fε sε yεbε nante Agyenkwa anamεn mu Yεsi hann no mu, yε'si hann no mu εyε fε sε yε nante Agyenkwa anamεn mu Hann akwan no mu.

english.title: ASAASE Fε NTI
verses: Asaase fε a εyε nti Ewiem anuonyam nti Ne dƆ a εfi yεawoƆ mu Atwa yεn ho ahyia no.
Adekyee ne adesae Mu dƆn biara ahoƆfε nti KokoƆ, abun, dua ne nhwiren Wi, Ɔsram ne nsoroma nti.
Nnipa dƆ mu anigye nti Onua, wofoƆ ne Ɔba Ase ha ne soro nnamfo Adwen pa ne ƆdwoƆ nti.
Wo asafo nsa kronkron a WƆm,a so aman nyinaa mu De dƆ afƆdeε a εho te Brε wo merε nyinaa mu nti.
english.chorus: Yεn wura yε de ayεyi Nwom yi reda wo ase.

twi.title: ASAASE Fε NTI
verses: Asaase fε a εyε nti Ewiem anuonyam nti Ne dƆ a εfi yεawoƆ mu Atwa yεn ho ahyia no.
Adekyee ne adesae Mu dƆn biara ahoƆfε nti KokoƆ, abun, dua ne nhwiren Wi, Ɔsram ne nsoroma nti.
Nnipa dƆ mu anigye nti Onua, wofoƆ ne Ɔba Ase ha ne soro nnamfo Adwen pa ne ƆdwoƆ nti.
Wo asafo nsa kronkron a WƆm,a so aman nyinaa mu De dƆ afƆdeε a εho te Brε wo merε nyinaa mu nti.
twi.chorus: Yεn wura yε de ayεyi Nwom yi reda wo ase.

english.title: TARRY WITH ME
verses: Tarry with me, o my savior, for the day is passing by See, the shades of evening gather, And the night is drawing nigh.
Deeper, deeper grow the shadows Paler now the glowing west Swift the night of death advances Shall it be the night of rest?
Tarry with me, o my Savior, Lay my head upon thy breast Till the morning; then awake me Morning of eternal rest.
english.chorus: Tarry with me, blessed Savior, Leave me not till morning light For I'm lonely here without thee Tarry with me thro the night.

twi.title: εNE ME NTENA
verses: εne me ntena o m'agyenkwa εda yi retwa mu akƆ Hwε sε enwunu no retƆ Na ade nso resa.
Adesae no re yε duru Na owia no retƆ Ɔwu anadwo rebεn ntεm εbεyε ahomgye mere anaa?
εne me ntena o m'agyenkwa Fa me ti to wo bo mu Kosi sε mεnyane anƆpa Daa home anƆpa no.
twi.chorus: εne me ntena m'agyenkwa hyirafoƆ Ka me ho kosi adekyee Wo nnka me ho a me yε ankonam εne me ntena anadwo yi nyinaa.

english.title: TOMORROW MAY MEAN GOOD-BYE
verses: We never know at the dawn of day, Greeting the rising sun Whether the reaper shall call away Ere that days work is done.
We live each day of this earthly life. As tho it ne'er would end Forgetting God in our daily strife Grieving this precious friend.
God guides our footsteps each passing day, Burdens He will relieve Promising freely sufficient grace, If truly we believe.
english.chorus: Tomorrow may mean good-bye, We never know when nor why, God calls us away, when life seems so gay Our bodies in dust to lie Tomorrow our souls may sigh For beauties we've let slip by, O soul then prepare, sweet heaven to share Tomorrow may mean good bye.

twi.title: εBIA ƆKYENA RENTO YεN
verses: Yεntumi nhunu adekyeε mu nsεm Mere a owia repue no Sε twafo no bεfrε yεn akƆ Ansa na onwunu adwo.
Yε bu yεn bra wƆ asaase yi so Sεdeε εrentwam da Yεwerεfi Nyame wƆ asetra mu Ma adamfo pa yi werε ho.
Nyame di yεanim da biara mu εbεyi yε nnesoa Ɔde adom pii ahyε yεn bƆ Sε yε gyedi ampa a.
twi.chorus: εbia Ɔkyena rento yεn Yenim mereko ne aseε Nyame frε yεn kƆ bere a aƆbara yε dε Yεn nipadua kε dƆteεm Yεn kra bεsi apinii kyena Nnepa atwa yεn ho kƆ nti Ɔkra yε ahoboa, kƆdi soro dε bi εbia Ɔkyena rennto yεn.

english.title: WHAT WILL YOUR ANSWER BE?
verses: Some day you'll stand at the bar on high, Some day your record you'll see Some day you'll answer the question of life, What will you answer be?
Sadly you'll stand, if you're unprepared, Trembling, you'll fall on your knee Facing the sentence of life or of death What will that sentence be?
Now is the time to prepare, my friend Make your soul spotless and free Washed in the blood of the crucified one, He will your answer be.
english.chorus: What will it be? What will it be? Where will you spend your eternity What will it be o what will it be What will your answer be?

twi.title: WO ANOYI BεYƆ SεN?
verses: Da bi wo bεgyina atεnmu mu Da bi wo bε hu wo nwuma Da bi wobεyi wo abrabƆ ano W'anoyie bεyε sεn?
Sε wonnyεε ahoboa wo ho bε po Na woabu nkotodwe Wo bεgyina kumfoƆ anaa bemdie anoƆ Atεn no bε yε sεn?
M'adamfo seesei ne ahoboa merε Yi w okra ho fi nyinaa Ma deε wƆbƆƆ n'asennuam mogya Nhoro wo ho Ɔno na Ɔbεdi ama wo.
twi.chorus: εbεyε sεn, εbεyε sεn εhe na wo bεdi daa nkwa no εbεyε sεn, o εbεyε sεn Wo anoyie bεyε sεn?

english.title: TO DWOM MA W'ANINYE
verses: Sε ewie mu ayε basaa Na wo werε aho Sε wadesoa mu ayεdu Da mu no nyinaa Sika nterεmu bi a εhyerεn WƆ soro asaase so Fa gyedie hwε na hu me nua Gyina ne bƆhyε kεse so.
Yεtaa yε mmerε amaneε mu Yεdi awerε hoƆ ne yea εbinom te bƆne mub nso wƆn wƆ wiase ahonya Mma woabam mmu yεntumi nkyerε Dea Ɔkyena de bεba Sε munumkum yi twam kƆ a Woakoma bεto dwom paa.
Yenntaa nhu nyankontƆn no a εba ewie mu no Berε a ayε sε wiase ahonya atwa yεn ho kƆ no Neεma bi wƆ hƆ a εsom bo sen sika ne dwetε Sε yεtwere no da biara a , yε bεnya anigye mmoroso.
english.chorus: To dwom na ma w'aninye nnε Pem so kƆ botae ho Twerε deε Ɔkyerε wo kwan no Ɔrehwε wok era so Ma wiase nhu deε wogyina Hwε Yesu na bƆ mpae Ma wone so na yi nayε To dwom ma w'aninye nnε.

twi.title: TO DWOM MA W'ANINYE
verses: Sε ewie mu ayε basaa Na wo werε aho Sε wadesoa mu ayεdu Da mu no nyinaa Sika nterεmu bi a εhyerεn WƆ soro asaase so Fa gyedie hwε na hu me nua Gyina ne bƆhyε kεse so.
Yεtaa yε mmerε amaneε mu Yεdi awerε hoƆ ne yea εbinom te bƆne mub nso wƆn wƆ wiase ahonya Mma woabam mmu yεntumi nkyerε Dea Ɔkyena de bεba Sε munumkum yi twam kƆ a Woakoma bεto dwom paa.
Yenntaa nhu nyankontƆn no a εba ewie mu no Berε a ayε sε wiase ahonya atwa yεn ho kƆ no Neεma bi wƆ hƆ a εsom bo sen sika ne dwetε Sε yεtwere no da biara a , yε bεnya anigye mmoroso.
twi.chorus: To dwom na ma w'aninye nnε Pem so kƆ botae ho Twerε deε Ɔkyerε wo kwan no Ɔrehwε wok era so Ma wiase nhu deε wogyina Hwε Yesu na bƆ mpae Ma wone so na yi nayε To dwom ma w'aninye nnε.

english.title: TI KRONKRON
verses: O ti kronkron a wapira Aniwuo ahyε wo so WƆdi wo ho fε hyia Wo ahenkyε yε nkaseε AwerεhoƆ ama wo ayε hoyaa Na wƆbƆ wo adapaa Anim a merε bi hyerεn sen wi N'afei abƆnfu yi.
O nkwa ne animuonyam wura Na wote anigyeεm Ma kekan anwanwa sεm yi Me pε sε wo yε me de Wo awerεho ne ayamhyehye Yε abƆnefoƆ dea Me na me yε maratoni Na wo hu ho amane.
Asεm bεn mpo na mεfεm Ada wase soro adamfoƆ Wo awerεhoƆ wuo yi Wo ahymƆbƆ a εnni awieε Na mma me ntƆ baha Me wura mma me dƆ mu ngo Na wo da biara da.

twi.title: TI KRONKRON
verses: O ti kronkron a wapira Aniwuo ahyε wo so WƆdi wo ho fε hyia Wo ahenkyε yε nkaseε AwerεhoƆ ama wo ayε hoyaa Na wƆbƆ wo adapaa Anim a merε bi hyerεn sen wi N'afei abƆnfu yi.
O nkwa ne animuonyam wura Na wote anigyeεm Ma kekan anwanwa sεm yi Me pε sε wo yε me de Wo awerεho ne ayamhyehye Yε abƆnefoƆ dea Me na me yε maratoni Na wo hu ho amane.
Asεm bεn mpo na mεfεm Ada wase soro adamfoƆ Wo awerεhoƆ wuo yi Wo ahymƆbƆ a εnni awieε Na mma me ntƆ baha Me wura mma me dƆ mu ngo Na wo da biara da.

english.title: SWEET PEACE, THE GIFT OF GOD'S LOVE
verses: There comes to my heart one sweet strain, A glad and a joyous refrain, I sing it again and again, Sweet peace, the gift of God's love.
Thro' Christ on the cross peace was made My debt by his death was all paid No other foundation is laid, for peace, the gift of God's love
When Jesus as Lord I had crowned My heart this peace did abound In Him the rich blessing I found, Sweet peace, the gift of God's love.
In Jesus for peace I abide, And as I keep close to his side, There's nothing but peace betide, Sweet peace, the gift of God's love.
english.chorus: Peace, peace, sweet peace, wonderful peace from above Oh wonderful, wonderful peace, sweet peace, The gift of God's love.

twi.title: ASOMDWOE, NYAME DƆ AKYεDEε
verses: Nkateε dεdε ba makomam εyε ahosεpε dwom bi MekƆso to no merε nyinaa Somdwoe Nyame dƆ akyεdeε
Kristo gye asomdwoe asendua so Ɔde ne wuo tuaa me ka nyinaa Obi nto fapem foforƆ bi Somdwoe Nyame dƆ akyεdeε.
Berε a me faa Yesu sε me wura Makoma nyaa saa asomdwoe yi Ne mu mεnya nhyira mapa Somdwoe Nyame dƆ akyεdeε
Mete Yesu mu pε asomdwoe Na mekƆso twi bεn no yi Asomdwoe nkutoo na menya Somdwoe Nyame dƆ akyεdeε.
twi.chorus: Somdwoe dεεdε Somdwoe nwanwa a εfi soro Oh, asomdwoe, somdwoe nwanwa Somdwoe Nyame dƆ akyεdeε.

english.title: WHO AT MY DOOR IS STANDING?
verses: Who at my door is standing Patiently drawing near Entrance within demanding Whose is the voice I hear?
Lonely without he's staying Lonely within am I While I am still delaying I am condemned to die?
Door of my heart I hasten Thee will I open wide Tho he rebuke and chasten He shall with me abide.
english.chorus: Sweetly the tones are falling Open the door for me If you will heed my calling I will your guest will be.

twi.title: HWAN NA ƆGYINA ME PON AKYI?
verses: Hwan na Ɔgyina me pon akyi Na Ɔrebεn me brεoo i Na ƆrebƆm pε sε Ɔbam yi? Hwan nne na mete yi?
Ɔno nko na Ɔgyina akyi hƆ Me nko ma mehyε mu Na meda so retwεn yi Wabu me fƆ a akƆ wum.
Mεka me ho abεbue Mekoma pono no Ɔka manim twe maso deε Ɔne me bεtena.
twi.chorus: Ne nne gyegye dεεdε sε Bue εpon no ma me Sε wotie me frƆ yia me ne wo bεtena.

english.title: I KNOW THAT MY REDEEMER LIVES
verses: I know that my redeemer lives And ever prays for me I know eternal life he gives From sin and sorrow free.
He wills that I should holy be In word, in tho't in deed, Then I his holy face may see When from this earth life freed.
I know that unto sinful men His saving grace is nigh I know that he will come again To take me home on high.
I know that over yonder stands A place prepared for me A home, a house not made with hands, Most wonderful to see.
english.chorus: I know, I know that my redeemer lives I know, I know eternal life he gives. I know, I know that my redeemer lives.

twi.title: MENIM Sε MEGYEFOƆ TE ASE
verses: Menim sε me gyefoƆ te ase Na ƆbƆ mpae ma me Menim daa nkwa a Ɔde mae Fi bƆne ne awerεhoƆ m'.
Ɔpε sε me yε kronkron Kasam'adwenem,neyƆem Na ma hu n'anim kronkronno Bere a mεfi asaase yi so.
Menim sε ne gyeε adom no WƆ hƆ ma abƆne foƆ Menim sε Ɔbεba bio abεfa M'akƆ fie wƆ soro hƆ.
Menim sε wasiesie baabi WƆ nohoaa ama me Efie , a wanfa nsa ansi Na εyε fε kyεn so.
twi.chorus: Menim menim se megyefoƆ te ase Menim, menim daa nkwa a Ɔde ma Menim, menim sε megyefoƆ te ase

english.title: IS IT WELL WITH YOUR SOUL?
verses: Mid the toil and strife of this busy life Is it well with your soul? Are you living right, should you die tonight? Is it well with your soul?
Have you lost your sin, Are you pure within? Is it well with your soul? Are you at the side of the crucified? Is it well with your soul?
Do you praise the love of the one above? Is it well with your soul? Will the crown be won and the Lord's well done? Is it well with your soul?
english.chorus: Is it well with your soul? With your soul, with your soul? Are you free, glad and whole? Are you living right, should you die tonight? Is it well with your soul?

twi.title: εNTI εYε MA WO KRA?
verses: Ɔbra yi brε ne abεbrεsε yi mu So εyε, so εyε maw okra Woabu wo bra yie sε so wu anadwo yi? So εyε, so εyε ma wo kra?
Wo ho bƆne asa, na woakomam te? So εyε, so εyε ma w okra/ Wo wƆ deε wƆbƆ n'asεnnuma no afa So εyε, so εyε ma wo kera?
Woyi Ɔsoroni no dƆ no ayε? So εyε, so εyε ma w okra Wobenya ahenkyε ne Awurade amo So εyε, so εyε ma w okra?
twi.chorus: So εyε, so εyε Ma w okra, ma w okra Wode wo ho anigyeεm Wobu wo bra yie sε wu anadwo yi? So εyε, so εyε ma wo kra?

english.title: WHEN THE SAVED GET TO HEAVEN
verses: Sing the wondrous love of Jesus, Sing His mercy and his grace In the mansions, bright and blessed, He'll prepare for us a place
While we walk the pilgrim pathway Clouds will over spread the sky But when trav'ling days are over, Not a shadow, not a sigh,
Let us then be true and faithful Trusting, serving every day Just one glimpse of Him in glory Will the toils of life repay
We don't know when we'll go to our salvation Soon we'll see His beauty Soon the door will open And we'll walk on streets of gold.
english.chorus: When the saved get to heaven, What a day of rejoicing that will be When the saved see Jesus, They'll sing and shout the victory

twi.title: Sε AHOTEFOƆ KƆ εSORO A
verses: To Yesu dƆ nwanwa ho dwom N';ahummƆborƆ ne n'adom Adan pa a wahyira so mu Na Ɔbε pε baabi ama yεn.
Yεretu Ɔsoro kwan yi Munumkum bεyε wiea mu tumm Sε akwantu nna ba awieε a Yεnsi apinii nye akyinnye.
εnto moma yεn ni nokorε Ntwere no, nsom no daa nyinaa Sε yε hu n'animuonyam prεko pε a Na yεadwuma akatua aba.
Yεnpim nkƆ yεn botae no ho εnkyε yε bεhu n'ahoƆfε εnkyε apono bεbue Na yεnante sika akwan so.
twi.chorus: Sε ahyirafoƆ kƆ soro εbεyε ahosεpε da kεse Sε ahyirafoƆ hu Yesu a WƆbεteaεma ato nkonimmdeε.

english.title: WE SHALL SEE THE KING SOME DAY
verses: Tho the way we journey may be often drear, We shall see the King some day; On that blessed morning clouds will disappear We shall see the King some day.
After pain and anguish, After the toil and care, We shall see the King some day Thru the endless ages joy and blessing share We shall see the King some day.
After foes are conquered After the battles won After strife is over, after set of sun We shall see the King some day.
english.chorus: We shall see the King some day, We shall see the King some day, We shall shout and sing some day Gathered round the throne When he shall call his own, We shall see the King some day.

twi.title: YεBεHUNU εHENE NO DA BI
verses: Sε yεn kwan no mu Taa yε hu sεn ara a Yεbεhu hεn hene da bi Saa anƆpa no munumkum bεfi hƆ Yεbεhu yεn hene da bi.
Yea ne awerεhoƆ akyi Berε ne amaneε akyi Yεbεhu yεn hene da bi Daa nkwa no mu Yεbεkyε anigyeε ne nhyira Yεbεhu yεn hene da bi.
Sε yεdi atamfoƆ so Na yεdi nkonima Yεbεhu yεn hene da biƆ Sε yεn brε yi twa mu Na owia tƆ a Yεbεhu yεn hene da bi
twi.chorus: Yεbεhu yεn hene da bi Yεbεteam ato dwom da bi Yεbεhyia n'anim na Ɔbεfrε ne mma Yεbεhu yεn hene da bi.

english.title: O THOU FOUNT OF EVERY BLESSING
verses: O Thou Fount of every blessing Tune my heart to sing thy grace Streams of mercy, never ceasing, Call for songs of loudest praise. Teach me ever to adore thee May I still my goodness prove While the hope of endless glory Fills my heart with joy and love.

Here I raise my Ebenezer Hither by thy help I've come And I hope by thy good pleasure Safely to arrive at home Jesus sought me when a stranger Wand'ring from the fold of God He, to rescue me from danger Interposed his precious blood.

O to grace how great a debtor Daily I'm constrained to be Let thy goodness like a fetter Bind my wand'ring heart to thee Never let me wander from thee Never leave the God I love Here's my heart, O take and seal it Seal it for thy courts above.

twi.title: O WO NHIRA NYINAA ABURA
verses: O wo nhyira nyinaa aburaa Ma me koma nka woadom AhumƆbƆ nsuo a εntwa da Sε ayεyie nnwom kεse Kyerε me na me ntontom wo daa Na me nyi papa adi Bere a daa ani'onyam anidasoƆ De dε ne dƆ hyε me mu.

Ha na mesi m'Ebenezer Deε w'adom de me abεdu Na mesrε sε fi wo pε mu Fa me kƆdu fie dwoodwoo Yesu frεε me berε a me yε hƆhoƆ Na ma year afi ne nnwan mu Ɔhwiee ne mogya kronkron no De gyee me fii amaneε mu.
O mede adom ka kεse A merentumi ntua da Ma wo adƆeε no nyε homa Nkye m'akoma mfam wo ho Mma me mmfi wo ho da biara da Mennya Nyame a medƆ no M'akoma nie, gye na sƆ ano SƆ ano ma soro nnwuma.

english.title: TRUE WORSHIP
verses: Oft we come to gather, Oft we sing and pray Here we bring our off'ring On this holy day
May we keep in mem'ry All that thou hast said May we truly worship As we eat the bread.
May we all in spirit All with one accord Take this cup of blessing Given by the Lord.
english.chorus: Help us Lord, thy love to see May we all in truth and spirit worship thee.

twi.title: ƆSOM KRONKRON
verses: Yεtaa ba bεhyia mu Yε to nnwom bƆ mpae Yεde yε afƆdeε ba Saa da kronkron yi mu.
Deε woaka nyinaa ara εnka yεadwene mu Na yεnsom wo yiye Sε yεdi paano no a.
Ma yεn nyinaa nya adwen koro WƆ wo honhom mu Mfa nhyira kuruwa yi a Awurade de ama no.
twi.chorus: Yε yεadom, yεnhunu wo dƆ Na yεn nsom wo nokorε ne kronkron mu.

english.title: IN THE SERVICE OF MY KING
verses: To the harvest fields I will gladly go In the service of my King, With a song of love to the faint and low In the service of my King.
Let me over work with a willing hand Guided by his word, heading each command In the service of my King.
Let me win some soul that his life may be In the service of my King Let me sing some song that will make me free In the service of my King In the blessed service of my King.
Just a kindly word or a song or pray’r In the blessed service of my King That the lost may turn and his glory share In the service of my King In the blessed service of my King.
english.chorus: In the service of my King In the blessed service of my King, my heav’nly King It is glory here, joy beyond compare In the service of my King In the blessed service of my King.

twi.title: ME HENE ADWUMA MU
verses: Me de anigye bε kƆ afuo no mu WƆ me hene adwuma mu,(WƆ me hene adwuma mu) Mεto ƆdƆ nwom ama,Deε wƆatƆ baha WƆ me hene adwuma mu (WƆ me hene nhyira adwuma mu.) NyesoƆ (Soprano/Alto),WƆ me hene adwuma mu (Tenor/Bass) WƆ me hene nhyira adwuma mu me soro hene WƆ me hene adwuma mu WƆ me hene nhyira adwuma mu, me hene adwuma Animuony am ne da a εnni nsusuiε WƆ me hene adwuma mu WƆ me hene nhyira adwuma mu.
Ma menfa mensa nyε adwuma me pε mu WƆ me hene adwuma mu,WƆ me hene nhyira adwuma mu N’asεm kyerε me kwan mεdi Ne mmra so WƆ me hene adwuma mu WƆ me hene nhyira adwuma mu.
Ma mentwe Ɔkra bi a ne bra bεtena Me hene adwuma no mu, Me henen nhyira adwuma no mu Ma mento nnwom a εbεma m’ade me ho WƆ me hene adwuma mu WƆ me hene nhyira adwuma mu.
Mεka ayamye asεm, nnwom anaa mpae WƆ me hene adwuma mu,WƆ me hene nhyira adwuma mu Ama deε w’ayera aba n’anuonyam m’ WƆ me hene adwuma mu WƆ me hene nhyira adwuma mu
twi.chorus: WƆ me hene adwuma mu WƆ me hene nhyira adwuma mu me soro hene WƆ me hene adwuma mu WƆ me hene nhyira adwuma mu, me hene adwuma Animuonyam ne da a εnni nsusuiε WƆ me hene adwuma mu WƆ me hene nhyira adwuma mu.

english.title: WHAT DO I OWE?
verses: What do I owe unto my Lord My richest gifts can I afford? Shall I withhold my all from thee Who gave thy all to die for me.
No wealth to give of gems or gold. Yet naught I have shall I withhold, My life, my love, my service too To thee alone I would be true.
Upon the cross my debt was paid On thee, my Lord, my guilt was laid Oh thou alone may truly know How much to thee dear Lord, I owe.
english.chorus: What do I owe unto my Lord? My richest gifts shall I afford? Whate’er I do, wher’er I go, My all to thee dear Lord, I owe.

twi.title: εKA BεN NA ME DEε?
verses: εka bεn na mede ne wura M’ade pa bia mεtumi anya? Memfa m’ade bi nkame wo Wo a wogyaa w’ade nyinaa wu naam’
Menni sika anaa dwetε Nanso mennfa biribi nkam’wo Menkwa, medε ne me som nso Mεdi nokorε ama wo nko.
wotuaa me ka asεnnuaso WƆde mafodie to wo so Wo nko na wobetumi ahu’ εka kεse a mede me wura.
twi.chorus: εka bεn na mede me wura Made pa bia mεtumi anya Biribi a meyε baabi a mεkƆ Me wura made nyinaa fi wo.

english.title: WHOSOEVER MEANETH ME
verses: I am happy today and the sunshine's bright The clouds have been rolled away For the Savior said whosoever will May come with him to stay.
All my hopes have been raised O his name be praised His glory has filled my soul I’ve been lifted up and from sin set free His blood hath made me whole.
O what wonderful love O what grace divine That Jesus should die for me I was lost in sin For the world I pined But now I am set free.
english.chorus: Whosoever, surely meaneth me Surely meaneth me O surely meaneth me

twi.title: OBI NE ME
verses: M’ani agye εnnε na owia ahyerεn W’ayi munmkum afi hƆ Fi sε Agyenkwa no se obi a Ɔpε No mε neon ntena.
M’anidasoƆ boroso nhyira nka ne din N’anuonyam hyε kra ma Wama me so na madi bƆne so Ne mogya ma madi mu.
Anwanwa dƆ nid, adom kronkron nie Sε Yesu bεwuu maa me Na mayera bƆnem, medii wiase akyi Afei me de me ho.
twi.chorus: Obi a Ɔpε no εne me ampa εne me ampa, o εne me ampa Obia Ɔpε no εne me ampa εnε me onipa, obi a Ɔpε no ne me.

english.title: NAILED TO THE CROSS
verses: There was one who was willing to die in my stead That a soul so unworthy might live And the path to the cross He was willing to tread All the sins of my life to forgive.
He is tender and loving and patient with me While he cleanses my heart of its dross But there’s no condemnation I know I am free for my sins are all nailed to the cross.
I will cling to my Savior and never depart I will joyfully journey each day With a song on my lips and a song in my heart That my sins have been taken away.
english.chorus: They are nailed to the cross They are nailed to the cross O how much he was willing to bear With what anguish and loss Jesus went to the cross But he carried my sins with him there.

twi.title: WƆDE NO BƆƆ ASεNDUA HO
verses: Obi nyaa Ɔpε sε Ɔbεwu ama me Na mekra εnfra yi anya nkwa Ɔpεε sε Ɔbεtu asεnnua ho kwan no Na Ɔde me bƆne akyε me.
ƆwƆ dƆ ne ahobrεase, Ɔsi me ho aboterε Berε a εyi me komam εfii no AfƆbuo bi nni me so na me de me ho Fisε wabƆ me bƆne nyinaa asεnduam’.
Mεfam Agyenkwa no ho, mentwe me ho da Me de anigye betu me kwan no M’ano fafa bεto dwom, me koma bεto dwom Sε w’ayi me bƆne nyinaa afi ho.
twi.chorus: Ɔde abƆ asεnnua no so O Ɔpεε sε Ɔbεsoa ne nyinaa AwerεhoƆ ne yea mu Yesu kƆƆ asεndua ho Na Ɔsoaa me bƆne de kƆƆ hƆ.

english.title: SEEKING THE LOST
verses: Seeking the lost, yes kindly entreating Wanderers on the mountain astray Come unto me, his message repeating Words of the master speaking today.
Seeking the lost and pointing to Jesus Souls that are weak and hearts that are sore Leading them forth in ways of salvation Showing the path to life ever more.
Thus I would go on missions of mercy, Following Christ from day unto day Cheering the faint, and raising the fallen Pointing the lost to Jesus the way.
english.chorus: Going afar upon the mountain Bringing the wanderer back again Back again into the fold Of my redeemer.

twi.title: WƆN A WƆAYERA HWEHWε
verses: Yiw Ɔrehwehwε wƆn a wƆayera Resrε akobƆfoƆ bepƆ no so SƆ wƆmra ne nkyεn, Ɔgu so refrε Owura no nsεm no gyegye εnnε.
Mekyerε wƆn a wƆayera, akra a wƆayε merε Me wura pirafoƆ Yesu nkyεn kwan Mεdi wƆn anim nkagye kwan so Makyerε wƆn kwan akƆ daa nkwa mu.
Saa na mεtu ahumƆbƆ kwan no Dabiara mεdi Kristo akyi Mεkyekyewerε ama asehwefoƆ so Mεkyerε ayarefoƆ Yesu, εkwan no.
twi.chorus: MerekƆ akyiri mepƆ no so hƆ AkƆtwe akobƆfoƆ aba MegyefoƆ no nwankuo no mu bio Ysu a wƆkuu no maa abƆnefoƆ.

english.title: I WILL SING THE WONDROUS STORY
verses: I will sing the wondrous story Of the Christ who died for me, How he left His home in glory, For the cross on Calvary.
I was lost, but Jesus found me Found the sheep that went astray Threw his loving arms around me Drew me back into His way.
I was bruised, but Jesus healed me Faint was I from many a fall Sight was gone, and fears possessed me But he freed me from them all.
Days of darkness still come o’er me, Sorrow’s paths I often tread But the Saviour still is with me By His hand I’m safely led.
He will keep me till the river, Rolls its waters at my feet Then He’ll bear me safely over Where the saved ones I shall meet.
english.chorus: Yes, I’ll sing the wondrous story Of the Christ who died for me Sing it with the saints in glory, Gathered by the crystal sea.

twi.title: MεTO ANWASεM
verses: Mεto Kristo a owu maame No anwanwasεm no ho dwom Sεdeε Ɔgyaa n’anuo’nyam fie Bεfaa asendua Kalvary.
Meyerae na Yesu huu me Sε odwan a wafom kwan Ɔde ne dƆ basa sƆ m’mu Twee me baa ne kwan so bio.
Mepirae, Yesu yεε m’aduro M’asehwe maa me tƆƆ piti M’ani firae, na εhu kaa me Na Ɔgyee me fii ne nyinaa mu.
εsum nna da so ba me so Metaa fa awerεhoƆ kwan so Nanso Agyenkwa no ka me ho Ne nsa kyerε me kwan dwoodwoo.
Ɔbεkora me akosi sε mεdu nsuo no agya hƆ na Ɔde me bεtwa dwoodwo akƆhyia ahyirafoƆ.
twi.chorus: Yiw, mεto Kristo a owu maame N’anwanwasεm no ho dwom Me ne ahotefoƆ bεhyiam po no ano Ato no an’uonyam mu.

english.title: MEDE ME NKWA MAA WO
verses: Mede me nkwa maa wo Hwiee me mogya dehyeε gui Sε wo bε de wo ho Anyani afi owuo m’ Mede, mede me nkwa maa wo Deεn na wode ama me?
M’Agya fie a εhyerεn M’anu’onyam ahendwa no Megyae baa asaase yi sum mu Nante-brε ne awerεhoƆ m’ Megyae, megyae ne nyinaa maa wo Deεn na woagyae ama me?
Mehuu amaneε pii maa wo Kyεn deε wobεtumi aka Yea a εnni kabea De gyee wo fii εgya m’ M’asoa, m’asoa ne nyinaa ama wo Deεn na w’asoa ama me?
Mede nkwagye a εyε pε MedƆ ne fafiri nso Fi me soro fie nohoaa Abεkyε wo kwa Mede, mede nepa kyε wo Deεn na wode brε me?
